meta.name: Escape to the Country
meta.description: A series which helps prospective buyers find their dream home in the country.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Rock'n'roll meets rural charm as Nicki Chapman helps a young couple of professional musicians swap the city soundscape for the Oxfordshire countryside. They're after a home with enough space to turn the volume up to eleven and hopefully keep the neighbours happy too! A beam-filled, characterful mystery house strikes the right note, and Nicki also meets a South American baker bringing a taste of home to a small village bakery.

videos.title: Barbican to Somerset
videos.overview: A couple look for an environmentally friendly home in the west of England, where they hope to generate their own electricity and embrace the rural way of life - but a budget of £270,000 may not be enough to buy them the cottage of their dreams in leafy Wiltshire.

videos.title: Earls Court To The West Country
Leeds to Anglesey
videos.overview: A couple from Leeds search for a traditional farmhouse in Wales with the help of Catherine Gee and former estate agent Nick Page.

videos.title: Bolton to Cumbria
videos.overview: Nick Page sets out to help Joe Fish, a radio DJ from Bolton who has recently fallen ill, find a peaceful countryside retreat in the Lake District.

videos.title: Tulse Hill to Sussex
videos.overview: A couple from south London journey to Sussex in a bid to find their ideal rural retreat, with plenty of outbuildings high on their list of requirements. Presenter Catherine Gee is on hand to help.

videos.title: Bristol to the Wye Valley
videos.overview: Catherine Gee comes to the aid of a Bristol family that wants to buy a property in Herefordshire's picturesque Wye Valley. With £330,000 to spend, it needs somewhere with outbuildings, space for the children to play and plenty of peace and quiet.

videos.title: Forest Gate to Essex
videos.overview: Charity worker Clare Felix would like to adopt more children and longs to bring them up away from the confines of London. Presenter Catherine Gee assists her in her search for the idyllic rural retreat.

videos.title: Earl's Court to Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Michael and Tania Steinbeck-Reeves decide to leave their Victorian townhouse in central London, and start a new life in the shires.

videos.title: London to Devon
videos.overview: Catherine Gee helps Chris and Sue Neaves escape the London rat race by seeking out their ideal rural retreat in the Dorset or Devon countryside. Their main requirement is inspirational scenery to fuel Chris's watercolour painting - which is in increasing demand in Lyme Regis.

videos.title: Cardiff to the Forest of Dean
videos.overview: Nick Page helps a Cardiff couple keen to move to a rural retreat in the Forest of Dean - despite the misgivings of their three grown-up children.

videos.title: Balham to Cornwall
videos.overview: Former estate agent Nick Page helps looking for a property in which to set up a surfing school in Cornwall after deciding to quit their city jobs for the coast.

videos.title: Reading to East Anglia
videos.overview: Nick Page helps the Camerons find a home in the tranquil Bedfordshire countryside, away from the hustle and bustle of Reading, where they have lived for more than 20 years.

videos.title: Woking to Devon
videos.overview: Nick Page helps a couple look for the perfect country retreat in Devon, away from the noisy M25 near their current location in Woking, but the pair have already viewed 80 houses.

videos.title: Warrington to Northumberland
videos.overview: Catherine Gee finds properties for a Warrington family with a budget of £500,000 who want an isolated retreat in Northumberland. Among the residences on offer are a seven-bedroom manor house and a property with its own bar, swimming pool and games room.

videos.title: Birmingham to Shropshire
videos.overview: Nick Page sets out to find Birmingham newlyweds the perfect family home in rural Shropshire, but they have very different tastes - one likes modern styles, while the other is a fan of the traditional.

videos.title: Surrey to Rural Cardiff
videos.overview: Catherine Gee helps two doctors relocate from the Surrey suburbs to the Welsh countryside. Armed with a budget of £600,000, the couple want to be near a good school for their two children and require at least five bedrooms.

videos.title: Canvey Island to Rural Essex
videos.overview: Catherine Gee comes to the aid of the secretary of Canvey Island FC, who has £500,000 to spend on a property in rural Essex, which must be within commuting distance of his beloved football ground.

videos.title: Streatham to Cambridgeshire
videos.overview: Catherine Gee comes to the aid of a Streatham couple who are fed up with living next to a railway line. They fancy somewhere quieter in Cambridgeshire, and have £350,000 to spend on their dream home.

videos.title: Leamington Spa to Cornwall
videos.overview: Catherine Gee comes to the aid of a middle-aged couple who have decided to leave their busy town life in Leamington Spa and buy a home in rural Cornwall with plenty of space for gardening and access to good fishing.

videos.title: Nottingham to South Yorkshire
videos.overview: Catherine Gee helps a keen organic gardener from Nottingham find a property with plenty of land in rural Yorkshire on a budget of £300,000.

videos.title: Harrow to Buckinghamshire
videos.overview: Catherine Gee comes to the aid of music teachers Kathryn Stagg and Darren Lightowlers, who are looking for an isolated rural retreat in Buckinghamshire where they can practise without disturbing the neighbours.

videos.title: Berkhamsted to Suffolk Coast
videos.overview: Catherine Gee helps a couple with strong but opposing ideas search for a coastal property in rural Suffolk to fulfill their dream of living in the countryside - and enable the man of the house to be closer to his boat.

videos.title: Notting Hill to Dorset
videos.overview: Melissa Porter comes to the aid of a Notting Hill couple who want to buy a large country house in Dorset where they can raise their baby daughter. With up to £500,000 to spend, they need a property which has a garden big enough to install a swimming pool.

videos.title: Solihull to Warwickshire
videos.overview: Catherine Gee helps a pilot and a flight attendant find their ideal rural retreat together in Warwickshire. However, while they want a peaceful countryside setting, access to the airport is vital.

videos.title: Gateshead to West Yorkshire
videos.overview: Melissa Porter helps a couple who met over the internet find a home in Yorkshire. They have £250,000 to spend, and claim they are willing to renovate. However, the properties on offer may require more work than expected.

videos.title: North London to the Peak District
videos.overview: Melissa Porter helps a family relocate from London to the Peak District on a budget of £600,000. Husband Tim wants a property he can fix up, but wife Donna isn't so sure about the idea.

videos.title: Glasgow to Scottish Borders
videos.overview: Retired engineer Malcolm Allan has lived in Glasgow for 30 years, but is now looking for a more tranquil environment. Melissa Porter is on hand to help him find a traditional cottage in the Scottish Borders.

videos.title: Aldershot to Cornwall
videos.overview: Melissa Porter helps a couple from Aldershot, who are about to adopt two children, to start a new life in Cornwall on a budget of £370,000.

videos.title: Northampton to Pembrokeshire
videos.overview: A photographer and a passionate gardener decide to move out of their Northampton home, so Catherine Gee helps them look for an inspiring new property on the tranquil Pembrokeshire coast.

videos.title: Aylesbury to Worcestershire
videos.overview: Melissa Porter helps Aylesbury couple Stuart and Sarah search for their dream cottage in Worcestershire. The pair have a budget of £320,000 to spend and the new property needs to have a garden big enough for their dog.

videos.title: Stockport to North Wales
videos.overview: Melissa Porter helps a Stockport couple search for a country house for less than £350,000 in Conwy, North Wales, which they hope will provide enough land for their new plans and hobbies.

videos.title: Belper to Lincolnshire
videos.overview: Catherine Gee helps a Derbyshire couple find their first house together in the Lincolnshire Fens on a budget of £225,000.

videos.title: Ruislip to Berkshire
videos.overview: Catherine Gee helps a Ruislip couple whose son has been signed to Chelsea's under-nines team. She hopes to find them a new home in Berkshire on a budget of £480,000, with a garden large enough for the budding footballer to practise in.

videos.title: Twickenham to North Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Catherine Gee has a budget of £500,000 to find a family based in Twickenham a four bed house with at least two reception rooms in a village with good schools, a great boozer and bags of community spirit.

videos.title: Hampstead to Cotswolds
videos.overview: Advertising executive Jules Hinds has had enough of city life. Despite living in one of London's most desirable postcodes, NW3, she wants to swap her two bed Hampstead flat for a chocolate box cottage in the Cotswolds. To achieve her goal she has given Catherine Gee a wide ranging budget, between £300,000 and £500,000, but will Catherine have to spend all of her funds to find Jules the house of her dreams?

videos.title: Chafford Hundred to Kent
videos.overview: Li and Steve Brookman along with their girls Dot and Edie want to escape from their new estate on the edge of the M25, in Essex, to a country home in Kent. Catherine Gee has a budget of £300,000 to find them a three bed period property with space to set up a dark home for Li's future photography business, while Steve needs to be within striking distance of London. Can Catherine find them the house they want, in a village with good schools, shops and pubs, for their money?

videos.title: Cardiff to Gwynedd
videos.overview: Gwyneth and Rhys Llywelyn want to return to their country roots in the heart of the Welsh valleys and mountains. Rhys works as a fishing officer for the Welsh Tourist Board and is looking to indulge his favourite pastime more often. Gwyneth is about to give birth to their second child and wants to be settled before the arrival. They have given presenter Catherine Gee £400,000 to find them their rural idyll.

videos.title: Sutton to Suffolk
videos.overview: Having lived in London's greenest borough for 11 years, Clare Ladd and her partner David Hackett are ready to swap city life for a B&B venture in the country. They restored their Edwardian house to its former glory and are now looking for a country house, ripe for refurbishment and renovation. Catherine Gee has a budget of £360,000 to find it.

videos.title: Dulwich to Hampshire
videos.overview: Simon and Sam Clough have just had their first child and woken up to the fact that most of their friends have moved out of London. In a bid to follow them, they're looking for a detached family house in Hampshire, with a budget of up to £700,000.

videos.title: Port Talbot to North Devon
videos.overview: The Turpin family want to swap their very unique Port Talbot home for a place on the North Devon coast with £700,000 to spend.

videos.title: Stratford-Upon-Avon to Somerset
videos.overview: Alison and David Partidge have decided to swap their detached Stratford-upon-Avon home, located on a very busy road, for a period cottage with similar dimensions in Somerset.

videos.title: Westbury-on-Trym to Wiltshire
videos.overview: Presenter Catherine Gee helps a couple find a country pad in Wiltshire.

videos.title: Liverpool to The Wash
videos.overview: Presenter Catherine Gee helps a woman find a detached bungalow with three bedrooms and a good sized garden.

videos.title: Bury to The Wold
videos.overview: Presenter Catherine Gee helps a couple find a detached house in the East Riding.

videos.title: Battersea to North Norfolk
videos.overview: Presenter Catherine Gee helps a woman and her daughter find a four bed house with views of the country or, ideally, the sea.

videos.title: Torquay to East Anglia
videos.overview: The Haines are looking to swap the tourist hot spot of Torquay for the rural charms of East Anglia. With £500,000 to find the detached property of their dreams it sounds like a simple job for Catherine Gee. But not when she's also got to find a fully functional annex for the family's grandparents, Pat and Len.

videos.title: Buckinghamshire
videos.overview: Melissa Porter is house-hunting for 60s pop icon Jess Conrad and his wife Renee. Jess and Renee have lived in their house in Denham for over 40 years but are keen to move further away from the hustle bustle of London to the Buckinghamshire/Oxfordshire borders. Melissa's challenge is to find them a house with lots of star qualities.

videos.title: Northamptonshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps Andrew and Lisa Donley, who want to move from Manchester to the Northamptonshire countryside. His challenge is to find them a house big enough to accommodate Lisa's parents, but with only £320,000 to spend, can he be successful?

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson comes to the aid of a couple desperate to move from Twickenham to Dorset. But while one dreams of a property by the coast, the other would prefer to move further inland - leaving the presenter struggling to find something they can agree on.

videos.title: North Devon
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in North Devon with buyers James Youens and Monica Lopez Gomez. James and Monica live in Cheshunt, Hertfordshire and are keen to trade in city life for the wilds of North Devon. James wants to live on the coast, while Monica prefers village life inland. Alistair has to find a house that will appeal to them both.

videos.title: Lincolnshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Lincolnshire helping house hunters Warren Archer and Steven Barritt from Maidenhead to find their perfect new home. Warren and Steve want to return to their roots and have a smaller house, but Jules has his work cut out to find something to suit their lifestyle.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Melissa Porter is house hunting for Jacqueline and Geoff Hughes from Camberley who are keen to start a new life in east Devon with their three young daughters. Melissa finds four properties that fit the bill, but are they really ready to escape to the country?

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is with Jackie and Joe Barnes in rural Shropshire. Jackie and Joe are keen to leave their current home and life in Milton Keynes and move near Ludlow. As Joe is a builder, he is keen to take on a building project. Alistair comes up with four ideal properties including a barn renovation project. But will his buyers be tempted?

videos.title: North Cornwall
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is helping Felicity and Philip Wright from Derbyshire to find the perfect house in North Cornwall. Felicity and Phil are keen to start a diving business in Bude and Alistair's challenge is to find them four suitable properties with enough space and storage for their new venture, as well as Felicity's mother.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps Paul and Nicki Jukes, who want to make the move from Windsor to the Cotswolds before their baby is born. They have a healthy budget to spend, but Alistair's choice of properties causes some differences of opinion.

videos.title: East Sussex
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton travels to East Sussex to help John and Jean Bates from Norwood, who are trying to find the perfect house for their escape to the country. John is looking forward to country life but Jean is not so sure – will Alistair manage to find something to keep them both happy?

videos.title: Hampshire/Surrey Borders
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton house-hunts for a couple who are desperate to relocate for work reasons. They are after a three-bedroom house and have a healthy budget but Alistair has problems finding them what they want.

videos.title: The Lincolnshire Fens
videos.overview: Melissa Porter meets Milka and Brian Rusk who are desperate to leave Darlington and start a business in Lincolnshire. They want to buy a country pub to run an African-themed restaurant and so Melissa's property search is rather a challenge.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Melissa Porter helps Noreen and Danny French try and find the perfect property for their escape to the country. Danny is an air traffic controller and is due to make the move to the new centre at Swanwick near Southampton, so the couple are keen to find a village home nearby. With a new baby on the way, the pressure is on.

videos.title: Staffordshire
videos.overview: Melissa Porter is house hunting with Jenny Bowen and Simon Whittles, who are keen to trade life in Birmingham for a village in Staffordshire. They want a country home with all the trimmings in a rural location – but will their budget cope with their demands?

videos.title: Carmarthenshire
videos.overview: Allan and Susan Sneller are being shown a selection of country houses by Jules Hudson in Carmarthenshire, South Wales. The couple are keen to quit the rat race of the South East for a more relaxed life in South Wales, but can Jules find something to tempt them?

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson has four properties arranged for Roy and Clare King to view in Gloucestershire. The couple currently live in South East Wales and are keen to find a house big enough for their family and horses in the Forest of Dean. Will Jules manage to come up trumps?

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Melissa Porter is in Suffolk with Elaine and Alan Tomlinson from Kent on a quest to find them their perfect country home. They have a healthy budget to spend but want a lot for their money - can Melissa rise to the challenge?

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Melissa Porter is with architect Chris Donahue and his wife Marie from London, trying to help them find their perfect country home in Wiltshire.

videos.title: Surrey to South Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is helping John and Sally Salter from Surrey find their ideal country retreat in South Devon. They are keen to start a dog agility business so are looking for a country house with lots of land and outbuildings – a real challenge for Jules.

videos.title: Peak District
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is on the hunt for the perfect country property for Steve and Joanne Smith from Sheffield. The couple are keen to move to the Peak District and want an isolated location with stunning views. Will Jules manage to find the rural home of their dreams?

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is joined by Vanessa and Katie Novak from Sutton Coldfield, who are viewing country retreats in Oxfordshire. Can mother and daughter agree on what they really want, and will Jules find them their perfect home?

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps Amanda and Sarah Holland from Huddersfield find their ideal £1.1 million home in North Yorkshire. Will he manage to find a house that mother and daughter will agree on?

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Melissa Porter is house hunting in Somerset with Mark and Kelly Milsom who want to start a kennel business. They would like a house in a rural location with lots of land, but will Melissa manage to find them something suitable with their budget?

videos.title: Westbury-on-Tryn to Wiltshire
videos.overview: Melissa Porter tries to find the perfect country property for Kaya Halil and Nazife Yilmaz from Essex.

videos.title: Sussex Borders
videos.overview: Jules Hudson goes house-hunting on the Sussex and Surrey border with Martin Harvey and Joanna Whitehorn from Croydon as they look for the perfect property in the country.

videos.title: Mid-Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson heads to Mid-Devon.

videos.title: Manchester to Derbyshire
videos.overview: When ex-air hostess Julia Baynes posted a lonely hearts advert for a leather clad rocker she wasn't expecting to fall for Tim Ryan, one of the respondents. Tim's a committed conservationist and was living in a hut in the woods at the time, but he gave it up to move into Julia's Manchester house. They've since decided his home in the rural back-woods wasn't such a bad idea and are looking for a two bed cottage in the Peak District. Catherine Gee has £250,000 to make their dreams come true.

videos.title: Swindon to Sussex
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple from near Swindon who are hoping to find their dream house in Sussex.

videos.title: Monmouthshire
videos.overview: A young couple are keen to move to Monmouthshire to be near their family. Jules Hudson is on hand to try and find them their ideal home, but will he succeed?

videos.title: Middlesex to Leicestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Leicestershire to help a couple from Heston, Middlesex, house-hunt for the perfect family home.

videos.title: South Wales to North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in North Yorkshire with a couple from Urban South Wales trying to find them their ideal country retreat.

videos.title: London to Wiltshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Wiltshire to help a couple from London find the perfect home for their growing family.

videos.title: London to Cornwall
videos.overview: Jules Hudson travels to Cornwall to find a million-pound home and business venture for a family from London.

videos.title: Kingston-upon-Thames to Somerset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Somerset to help a couple from Kingston who want to downsize and buy their dream home.

videos.title: Rotherham to North Nottinghamshire
videos.overview: Presenter Jules Hudson visits North Nottinghamshire to help a couple from Rotherham find their dream house in the country.

videos.title: Camberley to Lincolnshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton travels to Lincolnshire to help a couple from Camberley find their dream house in the country.

videos.title: Bridgend to Pembrokeshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson travels to Pembrokeshire to help a family from Bridgend find their dream country home.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Kent, helping a young couple from south-east London to find the ideal country retreat.

videos.title: Snowdonia
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in North Wales, helping a couple from Sutton find the ideal property.

videos.title: South Yorkshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Yorkshire to help a Cambridgeshire couple find a family home.

videos.title: South Buckinghamshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in south Buckinghamshire helping a couple from the north find a home closer to their family and friends in London. But in such an expensive part of the country, will their budget stretch far enough?

videos.title: South Coast to Hampshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in the New Forest with a couple from the crowded south coast who want to put roots down in Hampshire. Although they have a reasonable budget, they still face a challenge to find a suitable property.

videos.title: Camberley to Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson goes house-hunting in Gloucestershire with a couple from Camberley who have a healthy budget.

videos.title: Yorkshire to Glamorgan
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in the Vale of Glamorgan with a couple from Yorkshire who are keen to make the move across the border and be nearer their family. Can Alistair find them the right house with a south-facing garden that they want so much?

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Presenter Jules Hudson is in North Lincolnshire helping a couple from South London who are desperate to find a country home with land for their 200 chickens.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Presenter Alistair Appleton helps a couple find an old and peaceful country home on the Shropshire/Herefordshire border.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Presenter Jules Hudson is in Northumberland, helping a couple who want to move near Hexham, but still be near enough to Newcastle to commute to work.

videos.title: Heston to Leicestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Leicestershire helping a couple from Heston house-hunt for the perfect family home. Will their budget find them what they want?

videos.title: Stratford-Upon-Avon to Somerset
videos.overview: Alison and David Partidge have decided to swap their town home, located on a very busy road, for a period cottage with similar dimensions.

videos.title: Northamptonshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson leads the search for a couple from Leamington Spa who are house-hunting in Northamptonshire. Among the properties of interest are homes with traditional features and contemporary barn conversions.

videos.title: Cheshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a Manchester-based couple find a fantastic country pad in Cheshire with enough land for them to keep alpacas. The couple have a budget of just under £1 million and Alistair shows them some stunning properties. Will any of them prove to be their ideal new home?

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Property expert Jules Hudson helps a couple from Hertfordshire hoping to retire in style in Dorset. They have a healthy budget and are shown some stunning properties, including one with regal connections.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton comes to the aid of a Hereford couple looking to downsize from their current seven-bedroom house now their children have moved out. The pair are intent on finding their dream home in the Glastonbury area of Somerset, but may have difficulty agreeing on a property that meets their requirements.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Oxfordshire helping a couple from Berkshire find a home with an annexe and land for two horses. They have a healthy budget of £800,000, but acres of land don't come cheap. Will they be taken by any of the properties Jules shows them?

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps two city-dwellers find a country retreat in Somerset. The pair have a budget of £650,000 and are hoping to find a property with a large kitchen, a music room, somewhere to grow vegetables and keep pigs, and enough space to build a swimming pool.

videos.title: Perthshire
videos.overview: In Perthshire, Alistair Appleton helps a Surrey couple find an idyllic retreat suitable for setting up an animal sanctuary. However, when the pair reveal their ambition is to keep donkeys, the presenter finds appropriate locations are much more difficult to come by.

videos.title: West Sussex
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a Surrey-based couple whose four children have all left home, choosing both contemporary designed houses and period properties in West Sussex for the pair.

videos.title: Sussex
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a family from Hertfordshire find a country home in East Sussex for their young family, and a tough decision needs to be made when members are torn between two properties.

videos.title: East Sussex
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple from Pinner, north-west London, as they search for a retirement home, with good views and a small garden, in the East Sussex countryside.

videos.title: South Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps two steam-car enthusiasts from Surrey who want to move back to their roots in South Devon - but require a property with outbuildings big enough to hold 12 vehicles.

videos.title: West Yorkshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton heads to West Yorkshire to house-hunt with a Hertfordshire couple looking to relocate for work, and hoping to find a property with period features suitable for their pedigree dogs.

videos.title: Cambridgeshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson visits Cambridgeshire to help a couple from Kent find a rural retreat with enough land for a quad-biking track. All does not go smoothly. Will they be taken by any of the properties Jules shows them?

videos.title: North Devon
videos.overview: A couple from Surrey with a £1.2 million budget are keen to find an idyllic country property in Devon with holiday lets. Denise Nurse is on hand to show them amazing houses, one with a very unusual business. Will the couple be taken by any of the properties they see?

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple relocating from Kent search for a country home near Bath, complete with period features and a contemporary feel.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple searching for a rural property on the border between Kent and Surrey from where they can commute to work and enjoy their social lives in Croydon, South London.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: In Herefordshire, a couple from Leeds dream of finding a country home perfect for their growing family. However, troubles arise as the pair realise they might not agree on what they want, and Alistair Appleton is on hand to help them navigate through the property market.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a young couple from south London who are keen to escape the crowded confines of their current location and move to Kent, on a budget of £1.2 million.

videos.title: Warwickshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple from Epsom, Surrey, search for a retirement property in Warwickshire. They are planning to downsize, but would still like a big kitchen and garage space for their classic car.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is on hand to help a couple from Hampshire find their dream rural retreat in Dorset. With a budget of £1.5million, the pair hope to find a property with a water feature.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton leads the search for a Norfolk property in the country which has a teenager's annex and land for four horses.

videos.title: Warwickshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a young couple, who love history and character features but don't want to spend their time fixing a place up, look for a rural retreat in Warwickshire. They have a budget of more than half a million pounds and need somewhere from which they can run their company.

videos.title: Bedfordshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple find a new home in Bedfordshire. They have a budget of £350,000, and are hoping to find a country retreat with room for horse-riding.

videos.title: Wales
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple with a £750,000 budget, search for a country farmhouse in Powys, Wales. With their ambition to raise livestock and grow their own vegetables, they are shown round properties with large amounts of land, plus a quirky surprise option.

videos.title: West Sussex
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a young couple find a gorgeous country home in West Sussex that is not too far from good rail links to London. They have a puppy and are expecting a baby. They love period features and want a house with character. Can Alistair show them the perfect family home within their budget?

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Gloucestershire helping a retired couple who want to leave suburbia for the perfect country retreat closer to their grown-up children. They want a property near to a village so they can make friends and they need a garage for their classic car. They have a budget of £400,000. Will this be enough to get them the house of their dreams? Along the way they visit a farm of Gloucester Old Spot Pigs.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple who dream of escaping to Cornwall. Ideally they'd like a place with a sewing room and a garden which would attract local wildlife. Denise shows them some idyllic properties - some with amazing gardens - and a very unusual mystery house. They have a budget of £450,000, but will they find what they are hoping for?

videos.title: Jurassic Coast
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton visits the Jurassic Coast in Devon to help a couple who want to buy a coastal property, perfect for fossil-hunting, on a £1 million budget.

videos.title: West Yorkshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson heads to West Yorkshire to help a pair of young doctors find their dream rural retreat. They have a budget of £700,000 and want a true country house with some acreage so they can rear some livestock. Jules shows them a selection of what is on offer including an amazing chapel conversion but will they be tempted?

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps to find a rural retreat near Shaftesbury, Dorset, for a couple who have just moved back to the United Kingdom after living in France for four years. With a budget of £350,000, the house-hunters hope to find a property with lots of space and views of the countryside.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple from East Grinstead find a quiet country home in the Cotswolds. They already have a home in Florida where they spend half the year, and they are looking for the perfect lock-up and leave property in the area of Bishop's Cleeve. Will Alistair show them anything suitable?

videos.title: West Sussex
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is in West Sussex to help a couple with a young family find the perfect country escape. They want to get away from the rat race, live the good life and grow their own vegetables. For that they want an acre of land away from any roads. Will Denise show them anything that suits?

videos.title: North Wales
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Wales, helping a couple to escape to north east Powys. They want to find an idyllic rural property with enough land to become self-sufficient and grow their own food, and they have a budget of £310,000. Will Jules show them anything anything they like?

videos.title: Staffordshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple search for a property near Burton-on-Trent. Having previously lived in a flat, they are looking for a family home on a budget of £300,000 in.

videos.title: Peak District
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton travels to the Peak District to help a couple find their ideal rural retreat. With one of the pair's parent moving in with them, they need enough space for an annex and are keen to buy a property they can spend time renovating themselves, but have not thought enough about the size of project they would like to take on.

videos.title: East Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple from the West Midlands searching for a Devon property with enough land for two rescued donkeys.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: A couple search for a home in Suffolk with enough room to accommodate their musical ambitions. The pair also hope for a spacious garden where they will be able to grow their own vegetables. With these requirements in mind, Tim Vincent takes the pair to a selection of properties in Stowmarket.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Cornwall helping a couple of teachers find their dream country home. They hanker after having a hobby farm with enough land to rear livestock and grow vegetables within striking distance of the Cornish coast. It also has to be not too far from Truro. Alistair shows them some beautiful properties and a mystery house with business potential.

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple find a rural retreat in Worcestershire. They would like a large kitchen and a spacious garden, but their expectations may exceed their budget.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse travels to North Yorkshire to help a couple who have been searching for their ideal country home for the past decade. Searching for a character property with a rustic kitchen, large rooms and a view, they search the Leyburn area and inspect a challenging mystery house.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Shropshire helping a couple looking for a dream home and a new pace of life. But the couple are divided over what they want - one likes period properties, while the other prefers clean and contemporary features. Will Alistair help them find something they agree on?

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in south Devon helping a couple search for their dream home. They want a cottage-style property with a country kitchen and easy access to the coast. Will they find what they are looking for?

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a mother and son find a home to give them a fresh start. They are moving from a big house in Norfolk to be closer to friends and family in Worcestershire. They want to downsize but need lots of space for their animals, and they are also looking for an outbuilding to turn into a craft centre. Will Denise show them any suitable properties?

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple searching for a property in the Cotswolds with a garden large enough to keep a goat, but the discovery that outside space is at a premium in the area means they may have to compromise.

videos.title: North Cornwall
videos.overview: Jules Hudson travels to north Cornwall to help four generations of one family find a home big enough for them all with space outside to keep chickens and play football. They are hoping to buy a property with five bedrooms, two receptions and an annex for the great-grandparents on a budget of £500,000.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a German couple searching for a dream home in Oxfordshire. Among the items on their wish-list are a kitchen with a range cooker and bathrooms with mixer taps - and they also hope to learn what a butler sink is.

videos.title: Wales
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Ceridigion, West Wales, helping a pair of singers find their perfect rural idyll. They want a home with room for a music studio and a couple of holiday lets to rent out. Will Jules show them anything suitable or will their expectations exceed their budget?

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple find a property with a business in Somerset. On a budget of £1.25 million, they are looking for a five-bedroom farmhouse in a rural setting, ideally with a stream. They view properties that feature an apple orchard, a poultry business and a mill with holiday lets.

videos.title: Bedfordshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in south Bedfordshire helping a couple who are moving in together for the first time. They hanker after a home in a rural location with enough space for their antique collection, and a private garden to potter around in.

videos.title: Monmouthshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson visits Monmouthshire to help a couple who are searching for their dream rural home. Having rejected twenty modern houses, they are now open to something older, with character. Will any of the properties Jules shows them hit the mark?

videos.title: Leicestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson visits Leicestershire to help a couple who are looking for a house for three generations of their family. They need ground floor living space for their parents, a big kitchen, and a garden for their three daughters to play in. Will Jules succeed in showing them their perfect home?

videos.title: Humberside
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton heads for the East Riding of Yorkshire and northern Lincolnshire to help a couple with five children search for a home off the beaten track, with a minimum of four bedrooms.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Jules Hudson visits Cornwall to help a couple who have a budget of £700,000 and are hoping to find a two-bedroom property with sea views, a television room, large kitchen and a garden in a tranquil setting.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple who want to get away from suburbia to find a property in the Kent Downs. They are hoping for three bedrooms, a music room and space for their beloved parrots.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Property expert Alistair Appleton helps a couple make the move from Walton-on-Thames in Surrey to Hampshire. Ralph and Deborah are making plans to secure a suitable property as they near retirement.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson visits Dorset to help a homesick couple swap their French chateau for a £1.6 million country house in the English countryside. They are after a period property with five bedrooms, all with en-suites, at least three reception rooms, a large kitchen diner with a cooking range and three acres of land. Jules shows them a selection of impressive houses but will any tempt them to buy?

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: A couple search for a home in Suffolk, where they hope to rediscover the rural idyll of their childhood, and Alistair Appleton is on hand to help Yan and Eileen find a property with an outbuilding to house their growing insurance business, as well as a large vegetable garden.

videos.title: Hereford
videos.overview: Jules Hudson assists a Herefordshire couple searching for a character property big enough to use as their home and also to run as a B&B. Martin and Anne are looking for at least three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a separate dining area for guests and a garden where they can have their own vegetable plot.

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple with three children and a fourth on the way search for a rural retreat in Worcestershire, but with more than 30 viewings already under their belt it could be a challenging search.

videos.title: East Sussex
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple hoping to set up their first home together in East Sussex. Ashley and his American girlfriend Mel are seeking a character property with a spacious kitchen, a study and a garden large enough for a vegetable patch.

videos.title: Lincolnshire
videos.overview: Tim Vincent helps a couple from Staffordshire find a Lincolnshire property where they can live and set up a camping business. Among the possibilities are an 18th-century farmhouse and a barn conversion.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Jules Hudson comes to the aid of a couple searching for a property in Norfolk with feature fireplaces and a garden suitable for raising chickens and pigs. Among the houses he hopes will suit their needs are a 14th-century cottage and a converted barn.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Tim Vincent meets a Peterborough couple who want to move to Herefordshire. They are seeking a character property, ideally close to an airfield, where they can pursue their hobby - flying a two-seater plane.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Property expert Jules Hudson helps a couple from Cheshire search for a rural home in south Cumbria. With a country-style kitchen and a garden large enough for a vegetable plot on their wish list, they view a barn conversion, a village cottage and a 17th-century former mill.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple from Essex who are hoping to find a home in rural Suffolk. The pair want a property large enough to house their antiques and collectibles, with a spacious kitchen and a garden for their dog to run around in.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Armed with a healthy budget of £750,000, Jules Hudson is determined to find a couple their first home together in the Wiltshire/Hampshire area. Will a vineyard, a giant chess board, and a swimming pool be enough to seal the deal?

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is in Dorset helping an ex-army couple settle down for good. After having lived in 30 different properties around the world, will their £600,000 pound budget finally find them their ideal home?

videos.title: Buckinghamshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton gallops through the Buckinghamshire property market in search of the perfect equestrian home for a young couple. They want to spend a whopping £800,000 to get a house with wow factor, but will they splash all their cash or listen to Alistair's sound financial advice and settle for something more reasonable?

videos.title: North Wales
videos.overview: Jules Hudson guides a retired couple in their quest to find the good life in north west Wales. With their children grown up, they have decided to sell their home of 28 years and fulfill their dream of finding a perfect country house. They have a budget of £450,000 and want enough land to grow vegetables and keep a few chickens, and a house big enough to accommodate the family when they come to visit.

videos.title: Scottish Borders
videos.overview: Aled Jones takes on a 'mission impossible' as he sets out to the Scottish Borders to find a property with at least five naturally fed ponds for a couple of wildfowl enthusiasts. Together with the ponds, they need five acres of land, a large kitchen diner and three bedrooms - all this for a maximum of £600,000.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: She's found her forever man, he's found his forever woman but will this couple from Bristol find their first forever house together? Denise Nurse is in Wiltshire with buyers who are looking for a party pad with a big kitchen, plenty of bedrooms for friends to stay in and land for a horse too!

videos.title: Monmouthshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Wales helping a mother and daughter find a house where they can start a new life and a new business. With £555,000 to spend, Mum loves character features but the daughter is keen on clean, modern interiors. Will she be won over by Wales's rustic charms? And will an outdoor pool seal the deal?

videos.title: Essex
videos.overview: Aled Jones helps a couple escape suburban Enfield for a slice of the good life in rural Essex. With a maximum budget of £400,000, the couple have a long wish list. They are seeking a detached property with bags of character, rural views, a big country kitchen and an equally big garden to create a veggie plot. Can they achieve all this within budget so close to the capital?

videos.title: Devon/Cornwall
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Devon house-hunting with a couple looking for their first home together. One of them is a hoarder with a passion for character features while the other wants a minimalist home. With a budget of £550,000, they want at least four bedrooms, a room big enough for an enormous music collection and at least two separate reception rooms. A huge kitchen/diner is a must, while a big country garden is a must not!

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is house-hunting in Shropshire. With a maximum budget of £420,000, he is on the hunt for a perfect country family home complete with three to four bedrooms, a spacious kitchen/diner, and, with four women in the house, stepdad would like an en-suite too! Jules finds a mystery house which could make all their dreams come true, but will they buy it?

videos.title: Warwickshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is helping a couple house hunt in Warwickshire. After living in London for 33 years their dream of moving to the country is finally becoming a reality. With a healthy budget of £600,000 in the pot, they are seeking a three-bedroom detached house packed with period features, a large garden and a garage for a sports car.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in the Lake District with a young-at-heart outdoor-loving couple looking for a lifestyle change. With retirement looming they are ready to leave their family home of 22 years behind, but after 18 months of house searching they have failed to find their Lakeland dream. With £450,000 to spend, they are looking for a minimum of three bedrooms, an open plan kitchen/diner, a small easily maintained garden and top of their wish-list, a village pub.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is helping a retired couple uncover their rural dream in Yorkshire. They have a budget of £310,000 and an extensive wish-list which includes a garage big enough to build a plane in. Airport hangar aside, they're seeking a detached cottage with character, two reception rooms, three bedrooms and a big kitchen.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Devon helping a couple with a budget of £550,000 find their first home together. Only their youngest daughter will be moving with them, but they would like to accommodate all eight children from previous marriages when they come to visit. They want a three to four bedroom detached house with a large kitchen/diner and plenty of outside space. Modern interiors are a must. In rural Devon this wish-list might make the search tricky.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman meets a couple who cannot wait to leave suburbia behind and trade it in for cosy country living in Kent. With a budget of £550,000 they want to downsize but are still looking for at least three bedrooms, a kitchen/diner, a garage and a large garden to grow vegetables in.

videos.title: Derbyshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton heads north to Derbyshire in search of an idyllic rural retreat for a couple from Herefordshire. With a budget of £375,000, green credentials are high on the property priority list, but while he craves rural isolation, she wants to be in a village.

videos.title: Surrey
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is helping a young family from Wimbledon. They want to move to Surrey and are looking for a four-bedroom detached house with a large kitchen diner and a garage for a classic car. The house has to be near good train links for an easy commute into London, as well as close to a good school. They have a maximum of £700,000 but will their budget match their extensive wish list?

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple from Maidenhead find the good life in the country. They've lived in their current home for 18 years, and with the children about to fly the nest, the time is right to relocate to Somerset. With a budget of £500,000, they want to find a three-bedroom detached house with two reception rooms, plenty of outbuildings for their hobbies, and at least two acres of land for growing vegetables and keeping animals.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Aled Jones is in Devon helping a couple of ex-property developers from Staffordshire find their dream home. They have an impressive budget of up to £1 million, but want a massive minimalist modern mansion with sea views in one of Devon's most rural and expensive areas. Finding a thatched cottage is not a problem in this neck of the woods, but what this pair are seeking is rather more elusive.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Dorset and Wiltshire helping a couple of self-confessed urbanites make a break for a new life with their young family in the country. They have a maximum budget of £430,000 and want a house with outbuildings to accommodate their growing microbrewery business, as well as a garden big enough for the children and their pets to play in.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple swap the suburbs of Southampton for semi-retirement in North Norfolk. With a top budget of £450,000, they want a period property with lots of character and a minimum of three bedrooms. A spacious kitchen and a big garden are a must, plus some storage and a workshop.

videos.title: Cambridgeshire
videos.overview: Armed with a maximum budget of £400,000, Aled Jones helps a family escape the big smoke to find a slice of paradise in Cambridgeshire. Top of the their wish list is a big garden for the boys to play football in, but they also want four bedrooms, a large kitchen, a music room and a study.

videos.title: Leicestershire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman heads north to Leicestershire to help a couple of hoteliers find their perfect retirement home. After moving house twelve times, they've decided to put down roots. With a budget of £350,000, they are looking for a three-bedroom detached house with plenty of space and light, a good-sized reception room, a hobby room each, and a garden large enough for a vegetable patch - plus a village pub to round it all off. It's an impressive wish list - let's hope they'll be able to compromise.

videos.title: Kent/East Sussex
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is helping a couple and their cats leave suburbia behind and start a new life in the countryside. They want to move to Kent or East Sussex and have a very healthy budget of £800,000. For that, they want a spacious three- or four-bedroom house with a utility room and a study. Above all, they want a garden large enough to accommodate a vegetable patch.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple who have viewed forty properties already but have come up empty handed. Their extensive wish list may have something to do with it. She is on a mission to find them the grand house they are after in Somerset. With a top budget of £750,000, they need a kitchen big enough for the children to have high tea, possibly five bedrooms, at least two of which en suite, an upstairs laundry room, an office, a paddock to accommodate llamas, a garage and an annexe for mum. Is this going to be mission impossible or mission accomplished?

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is in North Yorkshire and, with a budget of £550,000, is helping a couple achieve their dream. They want a radical life change and are looking for a property with up to six acres of land to set up a kennel business.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Oxfordshire. With £600,000 to play with, he is helping a nautical couple looking for a property close to the river so they can moor their boat. The ideal house will also have to provide bags of character, a minimum of three bedrooms for friends and family, and must have a large kitchen diner.

videos.title: East Sussex
videos.overview: Aled Jones is helping a couple from Wimbledon escape the suburbs for countryside living in East Sussex. Good rail and road links into London are crucial. For their top budget of £580,000 they are looking for three to four bedrooms, a big kitchen diner for entertaining, a couple of reception rooms and a big garden. They've already been looking for eight months and have not found anything they like. Can Aled deliver their country house dream in just two days?

videos.title: Powys
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Powys with a couple from Basingstoke. They love their big Victorian semi but hate suburban life. Leaving their home behind is not a decision they are undertaking lightly - they have been searching for three years and have already viewed 20 properties, none of which they liked. Will Jules find them the four-bedroom detached house they dream of, with all the period features, the three reception rooms, a good sized garden and within walking distance from the shops, all for their budget of £400,000?

videos.title: The Cotswolds
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is helping a couple looking to relocate their business and start afresh in the Cotswolds, but having designed their London maisonette from scratch, finding them the right property is not going to be easy. Armed with a generous budget of £800,000, they are looking for a property with plenty of period character - but not a typical Cotswold cottage. They want a big living room and a minimum of three bedrooms, as well as an outbuilding to house their growing business.

videos.title: Carmarthenshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple swap the suburbs for a slice of west Wales. With retirement on the horizon, the time has come to say goodbye to their large five-bedroom house in Kent and hello to the Welsh property of their dreams.The house they have in mind needs to have four bedrooms, a big kitchen and at least one acre of land. As mum is moving with them, a separate two-bedroom annexe is a must. So for a top budget of £500,000 they are looking for a lot of property. Finding two homes for the price of one is going to be a real challenge. Will they consider taking on a project to create their ideal home?

videos.title: Yorkshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is in Yorkshire with a couple keen to retire to the country. They will be leaving a large house in Essex behind and want to spend £500,000 on a property large enough to accommodate all their hobbies, with enough land for their two dogs and a separate lounge for mum, who is moving in with them.

videos.title: Pembrokeshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Pembrokeshire and has a maximum of £700,000 to help a couple achieve the lifestyle change they've always dreamt of. They want to run holiday lets and their ideal home should provide four bedrooms with a master en suite, a large country kitchen, a study and a garden big enough to accommodate a vegetable plot and some outbuildings.

videos.title: Yorkshire
videos.overview: Aled Jones is horsing around South Yorkshire in search of the ultimate equestrian pad for a feisty couple from Sheffield. With a fantastic budget of up to £1 million, they are looking for a house with that elusive wow factor.The perfect property should deliver a large family kitchen, four bedrooms, stables and at least five acres of land. But with one wanting contemporary and the other chasing character, it's going to be an interesting ride.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple keen on long walks in Constable country find their ideal home in Suffolk. With a budget of £450,000, they are looking for a large kitchen diner, a studio, a study and a south west-facing garden.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse introduces a couple of ex-property developers who want to leave Hazlemere, Surrey and head for the hills of Herefordshire with their two dogs and ten-month-old twins. They have already moved seven times while developing properties, but now it's different. The dynamic duo also run a business training company, and this move takes the business one step further.With a budget of £800,000, they want a family home that gives them a large kitchen with a 'heart of the home' feel, three bedrooms, country character features and at least four acres of land to house a smallholding, their business centre and the horses they plan to keep.

videos.title: North Wales
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple relocate from south Wales to north Wales, with a job promotion the driving factor. On a budget of £300,000, they need a three-bedroom detached house with a large kitchen and separate dining room. A garden big enough for a vegetable patch and a conservatory are also high on their wish list.

videos.title: West Sussex
videos.overview: Aled Jones helps a couple who have hardly lived together during their 34 years of marriage find a home together in the country. They have chosen to settle down in West Sussex, and with a budget of £500,000, they hope to find a three-bedroom period house with an area for grooming the dogs. Their wish list is achievable, as long as they compromise in certain areas.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple say adios to Spain and hello to a creative life in the Shropshire countryside. With a whopping £1 million budget, they want a magical property that will inspire their creativity. On a more practical level, the house must have five bedrooms, a large kitchen-diner where the family can congregate, and a library, or space to create one.As they want an organic smallholding, the property must also come with up to 30 acres of land. Finding a house that fits the bill won't be difficult - finding a house that feels right may be trickier.

videos.title: New Forest
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple with a budget of £650,000 find their dream country house in the New Forest.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton heads for the Lake District, where he lends his expertise to a couple hoping to buy a property suitable for turning into a B&B within their budget of £650,000.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple with a £500,000 budget who would like a family home on the border between Suffolk and Essex, enabling their children to grow up away from the hustle and bustle of city life.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple on their house-hunt in North Yorkshire. There's a budget of £650,000 to find them a house with enough land for a vegetable plot.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a young family hunt down the perfect home in rural Hampshire, with the help of a £600,000 budget, and with a large and safe garden on the wish list.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is house hunting in Shropshire with a family looking for an equestrian property with that elusive 'wow factor'. The search is helped by a healthy budget of £750,000.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson heads to east Devon, where he helps a couple returning to the UK from Spain as they embark on search for a home within their £500,000 budget.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Denise Nurse visits Somerset, where she hopes to help a couple with a budget of £650,000 find the perfect house to fulfill their dreams of a rural life.

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Worcestershire looking for a rural character property for a couple in search of the good life. With a budget of £650,000, a country kitchen and vegetable plot are a must.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is house-hunting in Dorset with a couple who are ready to leave the island of Jersey for good. With a budget of £550,000, they are looking for a modern house in a county famous for its old, typically English cottages.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a retired couple flee Nottingham for the Dorset countryside. They are after two living rooms, at least three bathrooms, an artist's studio and a study - all within walking distance of a village. With such an extensive wish list, will they manage to find what they want and still keep below the £500,000 stamp duty threshold?

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is house-hunting in east Devon with a young couple keen to offer their baby son a better quality of life. They want to swap the modern estate they live on with a character cottage in a central village location. They want three bedrooms, office space, a big kitchen diner and an equally big garden with countryside views. Can this be achieved for £370,000 in such a popular location?

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is house-hunting with a retired couple who, after almost three decades of dreaming, are finally ready to find the slice of rural Hampshire they've always craved. With a flexible budget starting at £500,000, they want a character property with a garage and a library. A decent sized garden in which to grow vegetables is a must too.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple who, now that their children have flown the nest, would like to fulfil their dream of moving to the country and starting a new business. Their hearts are set on Herefordshire. And with a top budget of £700,000, they're seeking a three-bedroom house with a country kitchen and extra accommodation to run a holiday let business.

videos.title: South Devon
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Devon with a couple who are looking for a light and airy three-bedroom house with a large kitchen/diner, an annexe, a garage and a low-maintenance garden. They want to be close to the sea too, but can all this be achieved on their £500,000 budget in pricey Devon?

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Aled Jones is in Wiltshire with a couple on a house hunt. With £500,000 to spend, they are seeking a detached house with a large kitchen, an equally spacious garden and stunning views. To top it all off, they would like a large games room to accommodate an army of toy soldiers.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple of newlyweds find their dream home in Cumbria. With a budget of up to £700,000, they seek a period property with four to five bedrooms, a large country kitchen and an annexe or outbuilding.

videos.title: Staffordshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple relocate from Kuwait to Staffordshire. They will be leaving a palatial house behind so will she succeed in finding them their rural idyll? With a top budget of £400,000, they are after a large kitchen-diner and a small, low-maintenance garden.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Hampshire with a London couple looking for their first family home in the country with a budget of £465,000.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple who plan to move to Cornwall to start a B&B business with a budget of £650,000. They would like a property with a minimum of six bedrooms in an idyllic setting with plenty of land and outbuildings.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple of air stewards find the perfect landing place in Suffolk. With a budget of £500,000, top of their wish list comes a garden big enough to accommodate a marquee for their wedding day. They are also after period features, four bedrooms and a large country kitchen, all within walking distance of a local pub.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Two escapees want to leave London and start a new life in rural Somerset. For their budget of £1.2 million, they are seeking a house and business combo. The family home should be set in plenty of land with a big kitchen, and a couple of good reception rooms. On the business side, they are after five holiday lets, or a house with B&B potential. Denise Nurse is on hand to help with the challenge!

videos.title: Peak District
videos.overview: With a budget of £700,000, Nicki Chapman is helping a couple from Manchester find their very first home together in the Peak District. They are after a detached period home with three to four bedrooms. They love entertaining, so a good-sized kitchen and a separate dining room are musts too. The icing on the cake would be a garden big enough to grow vegetables.

videos.title: Perthshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps a couple leave one of Europe's largest housing estates behind and start afresh in Perthshire. For their budget of £375,000 they have a lengthy wish-list. They are seeking a detached character home in a good plot of land within striking distance of a village. Must haves include stunning views, a big kitchen and four bedrooms. A playroom and outbuildings would not go amiss either. Thankfully they are open to compromise. On their budget it's all a big ask...

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Aled Jones helps a couple with their family of 14 dogs and cats go in search of rural isolation. After decades of urban living, they are ready to embrace Cornwall with a generous budget of £500,000 in their pocket. For these two animal lovers, location is key (they want to find somewhere remote). Their dream is to become self-sufficient, so the more land we can find them, the better!

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple find a detached period home with plenty of character in Suffolk. With a budget of £450,000, the buyers are seeking three bedrooms, a study and a small garden. Their ultimate dream is having a kitchen large enough to accommodate some serious cake baking.

videos.title: North Devon
videos.overview: With a budget of £550,000, Jules Hudson is helping a couple fulfill their big property ambitions. They are looking for a detached house with four bedrooms, a large country kitchen and a level garden for their girls to play in, which in hilly north Devon, isn't as easy as it sounds. They're also after easy access to good schools and want to be within a 15 minute drive of the coast. To top it all, they'd like the house to come with business potential.

videos.title: Buckinghamshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is helping a couple to find a property in Buckinghamshire with at least half an acre of land to keep some goats. With a budget of £600,000, they are looking for a character home with contemporary styling. They need two to three bedrooms, a large open-plan kitchen diner and one other reception room.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: With a budget of £650,000, Nicki Chapman is helping a couple find a house big enough to accommodate three teenage boys and three Rottweilers in rural Dorset. Four bedrooms and plenty of land are a must, plus space for entertaining, an art studio and a self-contained annexe are also on their wish list.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson travels to Herefordshire, where he hunts for properties for a couple of retired police officers ready to leave Blackheath in south-east London and begin a life in the country. He searches for a detached house with a minimum of two bedrooms on a budget of £500,000, that must also have garage space for their classic cars.

videos.title: Carmarthenshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple who are seeking an impressive house to retire to in South Wales. There's a healthy budget of £650,000 but a big wish list to go with it. Our buyers are after a large period home with six bedrooms to accommodate their five children when they visit. Good reception rooms, a sizeable kitchen and at least half an acre of land are also musts.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple fulfill a childhood dream, swapping the fast lane of London for an artistic life in the Suffolk countryside. Armed with £400,000, the duo want a detached period or ultra-modern home on the edge of a village. Their must-haves include a big kitchen diner, a large living room for entertaining and at least three bedrooms.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple desperate to retire to South Shropshire find their rural idyll. After 30 years in suburbia they have decided it is time to seek a more rustic and laid-back life. They have £400,000 to spend and are after three to four spacious bedrooms, a decent sized kitchen and a large sitting room. Also key to their dream property is a half to full acre of land to keep pigs in.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Denise Nurse joins a couple ready to leave their 1930's semi in Surrey and relocate to East Devon. With a budget of £700,000 they are dreaming of a large rural retreat. The period property they are after should be secluded with great views. A large kitchen diner and an ample garden are on their list too. They also need three bedrooms for when their grown-up children come and visit.

videos.title: Northamptonshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple who want to abandon urban life by the River Thames and find a suitable rural retreat in Northamptonshire for their £550,000 budget. The ideal place should have a large kitchen to entertain family and friends, four bedrooms, a garden with enough space to grow vegetables, and a big garage to house a valuable car collection.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in North Yorkshire helping a couple who are buying a house together for the first time. They have already dismissed over 1,000 properties so this hunt is going to be a challenge. With up to £600,000 to spend, they are seeking a house with four bedrooms and a water feature in the garden. A large kitchen is a must, as are a garage and a study.

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton meets a couple who want to exchange city life for a retreat in the country. He searches for character properties in Gloucestershire on a budget of £850,000, making sure the potential homes have four to six bedrooms, outbuildings and acres of land.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Norfolk helping an animal-loving couple find their perfect pad in the country. With a budget of £350,000, they admit to having a demanding wish-list which includes a good-sized living room topped off with an inglenook fireplace, a large country kitchen and enough land to re-home rescue animals.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Shropshire as a couple with a budget of £400,000 hope to ditch their urban apartment in favour of village life. After three years without a garden they are itching to find a rural retreat in which to flex their green fingers. Meanwhile, Alistair visits Boscobel House where he gets shown one of Charles II's famous hiding places.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple of self-confessed urbanites swap the big smoke for a country pile in Somerset. With a healthy budget of £650,000 they are after a large, period property with masses of living space to include a big kitchen, a separate music room and a study. Outside they would like space to grow veg and keep pigs, and even somewhere to put a swimming pool.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is house-hunting in Norfolk with a couple keen to find a detached home. Armed with a budget of £400,000, they are after three bedrooms, a big kitchen diner, at least one reception room and plenty of storage. A good-sized garden and a double garage are also on their list.

videos.title: East Midlands
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton heads to the East Midlands, where a man is looking for an English country home on a budget of £600,000 so that his family can move from Dublin to join him.

videos.title: Monmouthshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson heads for Monmouthshire to help a couple find a rural property with room to raise pigs, chickens and alpacas. With a budget of £500,000, he decides to enlighten the pair to the merits of barn conversions.

videos.title: County Down
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin visits Co Down in Northern Ireland to help prospective buyers find a property where they can retire. They have a budget of £270,000, and ideally would like a three-bedroom bungalow with a double garage overlooking the Mourne Mountains.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple find a country house in the Cotswolds. With a budget of £1 million, they have a range of options, including Jaceobean and Georgian manor houses and a quirky eco home.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Presenter Alistair Appleton helps a recently retired couple with a budget of £550,000 find a country home in rural Hampshire with a large "boys' toys" garage and a challenging gardening project.

videos.title: Carmarthenshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple of newlyweds with a budget of £500,000 find a home in Carmarthenshire. The man is a professional athlete hoping to compete in the 2012 Olympics so he has very specific requirements, including a gym and a big kitchen.

videos.title: Cambridgeshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple in Cambridgeshire with a budget of £440,000 who want to remain in the county and are eager to have a garden again after two decades without. He tempts them with an Edwardian farmhouse with extensive grounds, a pair of cottages and a Victorian former school house.

videos.title: Lincolnshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps property hunters with a budget of £275,000 downsize to a home in Lincolnshire that boasts open-plan living, two bedrooms and space for a vegetable patch.

videos.title: West Country
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple who are looking for a property they can transform into a business in the West Country. Their idea is to create a camp site with tee-pee and wood-burning hot tubs with their £950,000 budget.

videos.title: Yorkshire Dales
videos.overview: After 27 years of urban living, two keen walkers want to downsize to the Yorkshire Dales on a budget of £350,000. Alistair Appleton hopes an 1840's former salt store in Upper Settle will suit their requirements.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple find an eco-friendly home in Shropshire. They have aspirations to run a green B&B, self-catering lets and sustainable lodges, and cannot believe their luck when they discover a 600-year-old farmhouse with brick barns to convert and three acres of land within budget.

videos.title: Ceredigion
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in West Wales helping a couple with a budget of £385,000 swap the suburbs for a rural smallholding. Keen horticulturalist Brenda wants enough land to run a plant nursery, and husband Colin needs five acres, outbuildings and workshops for his collection of renovated tractors.

videos.title: Cheshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin comes to the aid of a couple searching for a large property in rural Cheshire, taking them to a former pottery with an open-plan 800 sq ft living room.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a retired couple to search for a home in the New Forest, Hampshire. Their children have left home so the buyers are looking to downsize with a £700,000 budget, but none of the properties they see is big enough.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin heads to Somerset, where a couple of expats with a budget of £500,000 want to find their dream home. More used to a spacious property in Australia, they need to accept the different proportions of English country properties, but the pressure is on with their possessions arriving any day.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Denise Nurse travels to the Cotswolds, where she helps a couple in a long-distance relationship look for their perfect home. With a budget of £700,000, she finds a 16th-century former court house with plenty of character.

videos.title: Argyll & Bute
videos.overview: Aled Jones visits Argyll and Bute to help a Scottish couple hoping to find a suitable property in which to set up an artists' retreat. With a budget of £500,000 in hand, the pair are taken to view a castellated Victorian property on the edge of Loch Fyne. Plus, a visit to Knapdale forest, where beavers are being re-introduced.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson heads to Devon to help a mother and daughter who are looking for a suitable country home for themselves and their three Shetland ponies, but while the mother is fond of something traditional, the daughter is after a property with a contemporary feel.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman visits Shropshire, where she helps a couple find a secluded property on a budget of £430,000. Among the rural retreats on offer, she shows them an impressive 17th-century former blacksmith's.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton hunts for properties with a couple returning to the UK from Italy, and hope to find a house in Dorset to rival their current lakeside villa. The presenter also visits the only dairy in the world that produces Dorset Blue Vinney cheese.

videos.title: Sussex
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a family swap city living for a life in rural Sussex. She searches for a property with plenty of land suitable for setting up a fitness boot camp, and locates a 1930's period house that boasts more than three acres and is on budget at £750,000.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Aled Jones heads for Cornwall to help a Derbyshire woman and her daughter find a new home.
