With a budget of £250,000 the pair hope to find a property with several acres of land to graze their small flock of sheep. The presenter also takes to the water to try his hand at gig racing.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman heads to Northumberland to help a farmer's daughter find a property with land on her £450,000 budget. The presenter also explores the wildlife of the Farne islands.

videos.title: Powys
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Powys, mid Wales, helping a self-employed couple seek out a more relaxed lifestyle. With their budget of £665,000 they are amazed at how far their money stretches, but will a seven bedroom Victorian property be a step too far?

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple returning from Australia find a rural retreat in Wiltshire on a budget of £600,000, but they are unprepared for the UK's property prices.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple with a budget of £500,000 retire to the West Country, hoping to find a suitable thatched cottage. He also visits the whimsical A La Ronde - a 16-sided, 200-year-old house inspired by an Italian cathedral.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Herefordshire, property-shopping with a couple who dream of owning a period black-and-white cottage with bags of curb appeal. They have a budget of £350,000 and are seeking a house with at least three bedrooms, space for two offices and a decent-sized country cottage garden.Nicki also finds time to help bring in the hop harvest.

videos.title: Perthshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse travels to Perthshire in Scotland to help an author with a £400,000 budget who is looking for a property where she can begin writing her next novel.

videos.title: Warwickshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton heads to Warwickshire, where a couple of newlyweds are searching for a rural home on a budget of £550,000. After viewing a cottage that is too small and a 19th-century farmhouse needing too much work, it proves hard to find the right combination.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is in Cornwall, helping a couple leave behind their urban coop in search of some free-range living. With a budget of £350,000, this move is all about their menagerie; with two horses, two dogs and with an eye on buying some llamas, land is a must.

videos.title: Essex
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Essex, helping a couple of sisters find a quirky home with a big character to match their own. With a budget of £400,000 they fall head over heels with both the property and Jules.

videos.title: Lake District
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is on the trail of stunning rural property in Cumbria, a county renowned for its incredible scenery. The buyers have a budget of £900,000 and are looking for a super-sized substantial family home with three reception spaces, five bedrooms and plenty of land. Denise also checks out one of Cumbria's oldest sporting traditions, hound trailing.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Cornwall with a couple looking for a 'showy' home with room to house their internet business. With a budget of £450,000, the property has to have a rural setting with a real 'chill factor'.

videos.title: Warwickshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is property hunting in Warwickshire with a couple who want to leave the stresses of London life behind and seek out a spiritual retreat in the country. They have a healthy budget of £750,000, but will a charming 17th-century mill house have the right energy?

videos.title: Essex
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is in Essex helping a young couple find an equestrian property with a budget of £575,000. But as the Home Counties are notoriously pricey, they may have to do some lateral thinking to get the house and acreage they are after.Jonnie also gets a master class in making bricks from the oldest brickworks of its kind in the country.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Suffolk helping a couple of newlyweds swap their current crowded house in the suburbs for a spacious country home. With a budget of £650,000, there's plenty to choose from including a 17th-century farmhouse, a classic Georgian home and a brand new thatched property. Nicki also gets a masterclass in ornamental plaster work.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman goes property hunting in Shropshire with a couple who need an outbuilding to house a private museum for their 700 pieces of World War II memorabilia. And with a budget of £400,000, they are spoilted for choice when it comes to properties with country character.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps two very exacting buyers in Kent look for a medieval oak-beamed barn with expansive living spaces on a budget of £630,000.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Dorset, helping a couple swap city skylines for open countryside. With a budget of up to £800,000, these buyers are tempted by a fabulous slice of a country estate with 350 acres of communal land.

videos.title: Wales
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman visits Gwynedd, North Wales, to help an artistic couple find a home with inspiring views for £450,000. While in Gwynedd, Nicki takes a tour of a local slate mine and learns how to craft one of the region's famous trademark tiles.

videos.title: Yorkshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin travels to Yorkshire to help find a rural home for a budget of £300,000. But there is a surprise in store for today's buyers, when one house proves too close for comfort.Away from the property search, Jonnie meets a local expert to discover the secrets of one of the oldest iron forges in the world.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton tackles a very expensive house search in Hampshire for a couple with £1.5 million to spend. Top of the agenda are space for entertaining and room for the in-laws.

videos.title: Lincolnshire
videos.overview: With a budget of £250,000, Aled Jones helps some young newlyweds hoping to buy their first home in Lincolnshire. During his journey around the county, Aled goes on a very unique delivery round with a community-based baking business.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson goes on a £650,000 house hunt in Dorset with a couple who have lived their entire married lives in separate homes, 70 miles apart. While in the county, Jules heads to the beach to search for fossils on the world-famous Jurassic Coast.

videos.title: North Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson takes on the difficult challenge of finding a home for two generations of the same family, with a maximum budget of £910,000 to spend in Devon. Whilst there, he climbs the county's renowned Hartland Point lighthouse to help with essential maintenance work.

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple who have been travelling the world, find a home with B&B potential in the Malvern Hills for £600,000. Plus Alistair takes to the open road for a breathtaking drive in one of the region's famous hand-made motor cars.

videos.title: Rutland
videos.overview: Jules Hudson visits Rutland, England's smallest county, as he helps search for a home for £400,000 for a couple from London. While in Rutland, Jules gets to grips with a unique set of traditional steam trains being restored by local enthusiasts.

videos.title: Yorkshire Dales
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman joins in the search for a rural home in the Yorkshire Dales for a budget of £420,000. During her journey round the county, Nicki also meets one of the region's beekeepers to discover more about efforts to protect the local bumblebee population.

videos.title: Cheshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson joins the house search for a couple with £1.2 million to spend in Cheshire's 'Golden Triangle'. While in Cheshire, Jules also visits the Tatton Park Estate, home to the only pineapple vinery in the UK and discovers how the iconic country home was run in its heyday.

videos.title: Northamptonshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple who are about to be married find a £400,000 home in rural Northamptonshire. During her journey around the county, Nicki takes to the water along one of the region's picturesque canals.

videos.title: South Cumbria
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton house hunts in Cumbria with active young couple, Carl and Leslie, looking to spend up to £300,000. Away from the property search, Alistair gets a taste for the delights of Kendal mint cake at a local factory.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Aled Jones helps a couple hoping to find a home with holiday let potential for £650,000 in Devon. Aled also tours the Devon County Show and discovers how local producers are doing their part to support the economy.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps a newly retired couple downsize to a smaller home in rural Oxfordshire, with a budget of £500,000. While in Oxfordshire, Jonnie is put through his paces by the head coach of the world-famous Oxford University rowing team.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman joins the house hunt with a retired couple who have spent the last two years travelling around Britain in their caravan. They have a budget of £600,000, and have decided that the New Forest is place they would like to settle down. Plus Nicki visits the last working tide mill in England.

videos.title: Lancashire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse travels to Lancashire to help a family with a budget of £525,000, who have outgrown their London home. Away from the property search, Denise learns the secrets behind the county's most famous dish, the Lancashire hotpot.

videos.title: Oxon/Wilts
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps a couple who want to leave their family home after almost 30 years. But just how far will their budget of £650,000 go in the expensive Oxfordshire countryside? During his journey, Jonnie takes a tour of Blenheim Palace, one of Britain's most renowned architectural jewels.

videos.title: Carmarthenshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is house hunting with a young couple who have decided to swap their life on the open seas for a slice of the Carmarthenshire countryside. With a maximum budget of £300,000, they are seeking a home with the perfect amount of land to set up an eco-tourism business. Plus Jules takes to the water in a Welsh coracle boat.

videos.title: North Devon
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple of young retirees find their dream home in north Devon. They have a budget of £500,000 and are happy to take on a renovation project, but the mystery house almost leaves them speechless. While in the county, Alistair takes to the River Exe for a unique spot of mussel fishing.

videos.title: Isle of Wight
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps a couple and their autistic son find a home on the Isle of Wight. With a budget of £800,000 to spend, they are keen to run a holiday let business for families like themselves. Away from the property search, Jonnie gets a taste of one of the island's biggest exports at the UK's largest garlic farm.

videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple, with a dream of mortgage free living, escape to the Llyn Peninsula, North Wales for a budget of £325,000. Plus, she goes horse riding along some of the region's most spectacular coastline.

videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin joins the house hunt in Cambridgeshire to help a retired couple who, after 30 years in the same home, want to move closer to their grandchildren. Away from the property search, Jonnie learns about the 100-year project to extend Wicken Fen and meets the herd of konik ponies so integral to its success.

videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple, with a budget of £450,000, return to their roots in rural South Wales. While in the region, Jules visits the remains of an iron forge at the stunning Aberdulais Falls near Neath.

videos.overview: Alistair Appleton comes to the aid of a couple with £700,000 to spend on a country home along the Essex/Suffolk border. During his journey, Alistair also tries his hand at the traditional craft of painting Romany caravans.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Devon, helping a couple of retired teachers find a rural retreat for a maximum budget of £600,000. While in Devon, Nicki meets a local farmer and experiences the delights of lambing season.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Denise Nurse joins the house search in Norfolk to help find a family home for a couple and their two children. With their £580,000 budget, they also need a separate annexe for granny. Denise learns more about a 20-year building project that aims to prevent the Norfolk Broads from being lost to the sea forever.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin travels to Norfolk to help a business woman, with a budget of £500,000, find a new home closer to her family. Away from the property search, Jonnie gets to grips with a famous steam traction engine.

videos.title: Berkshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a couple find their dream home in Berkshire on a budget of £1.2 million. During his journey, Jules meets the Queen's royal swan marker and helps release a rehabilitated swan back into the wild.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Shropshire, helping a couple buy their first home together for a budget of £550,000. While in Shropshire, Alistair pays a visit to Fordhall Farm, a unique smallholding saved from the hands of developers when it was turned into Britain's first community-owned farm.

videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a newly retired couple with a budget of £350,000 escape to rural Somerset. Plus Nicki gets to grips with some of the county's traditional Ham Stone.

videos.overview: Jules Hudson joins the house hunt in Derbyshire to help a couple and their three-year-old daughter find a country home for £450,000. Plus, Jules joins in rehearsals with a local digger dance troop practicing at the Derbyshire County Showground.

videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a husband and his wife, who has recently been diagnosed with a life-changing illness, find a country home near Leamington. Plus Nicki goes on tour with the Alcester Court Leet and becomes the first lady in their 750-year history to become a guest ale taster.

videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin house hunts in Cumbria with a couple of avid walkers who have £600,000 to spend. Away from the property search, Jonnie uncovers the grand plans to restore the renowned Lowther Castle and Country Park.

videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Somerset helping a couple find a country home for a budget of £400,000. While in Somerset, Alistair reveals his unique musical talents as he achieves his long-held dream of playing the organ at Wells Cathedral.

videos.overview: The race is on for Jules Hudson as he helps two retired police officers, with a budget of £500,000 who want to swap their caravan for a rural residence before the winter sets in. Plus, Jules visits Burghley House, the country home of Elizabeth I's principal advisor, William Cecil.

videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin heads to the north Devon coast to help a couple with a large budget of £1.2 million. Plus Jonnie is put through his paces as he discovers just what it takes to become a RNLI lifeguard.

Jonnie also meets a couple from a previous series who bought one of the houses featured on the show and successfully escaped to Somerset.

videos.overview: Nicki Chapman heads to the south Wales countryside to help a couple with £500,000 to spend on relocating from Newport to a village community.While in the region, Nicki visits the only whisky distillery in Wales which uses the mineral-rich water of the Brecon Beacons - to potent effect.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is on a house-hunting mission in rural Devon with a couple excited at the prospect of buying their first home together with their £525,000 budget.While in the county, Ginny heads to Salcombe Bay and sets sail in a Salcombe yawl, once a traditional fishing vessel and now a popular racing yacht, which has special design features to help chart these choppy waters.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is on a house-hunting mission with a dynamic couple in the Herefordshire countryside, hoping they fall in love with the homes they see for their £565,000 budget.Along the way, Alistair headsto the banks of the River Wye to get to grips with paddle boarding, an ever growing low-impact water sport.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps a rural property-shopping couple with an £850,000 budget put down roots closer to family in Somerset.Along the way Jonnie visits Glastonbury and learns how its religious past and strong links to English legend still resonate with people there today.

videos.title: Wye Walley
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin's property search is in the Wye Valley, where he helps an entrepreneurial couple with a £650,000 budget find a dream home which allows them to build a rural business. Along the way he visits theUK's first solar aquaponics greenhouse and discovers how 21st-century technology there could be the sustainable solution to growing enough food to solve the world's food shortage.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is in Northumberland with an adventurous couple of empty nesters who want their £500,000 budget to buy them a country house with land to earn an income from running a yurt campsite.While in the county, Ginny visits Hexham Abbey, where the passageways and historic remains shed light on a 1,300-year history.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is in Wiltshire helping a couple with a £650,000 budget to go the distance and make the 500-mile move from a Scottish city to the English countryside. Away from the house hunting, Jonnie joins afarmer, his dog and his flock for a husbandry masterclass with a unique breed of sheep native to the county.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is house-searching in rural North Yorkshire with a couple who, on their £800,000 budget, want to return to their Yorkshire roots. Their grand plan is to combine country life with their love ofcats by running a cattery. Along the way, Ginny pauses in Harrogate to take afternoon tea and enjoys a nostalgic taste of the region's traditional sweet treats.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is helping a house-hunting couple with a £900,000 budget move back from France and find an impressive rural retreat in the Norfolk countryside. Whilst in the county, Ginny heads to the NorfolkBroads to discover the important role that mills have played in keeping this low-lying landscape above water. She visits the Wind Power Museum, home to a collection of mills and engineering gems, to hear the story of one local mill restoration hero.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: In Devon, the pressure is on for Margherita Taylor as she helps a hardworking house buyer with a £300,000 budget and a tight deadline to relocate before the new job starts.While in the Devon countryside, Margherita visits the Pebblebed vineyards during the grape harvest and sees how commitment and community involvement have been winning ingredients in helping put English wines on the map.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Hampshire with a dynamic couple who love the outdoors and have £650,000 to buy a property that gives them the best of both countryside and coast. While in the county, Jules visits the Solent Sky Museum, which celebrates the area's impressive aviation heritage, including the original design of the Spitfire, a crucial fighter aircraft during the Second World War.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is in Shropshire house searching for the perfect country retreat with a couple who have a £450,000 budget to make the move back from France to reconnect with the British countryside and be part of a village community.While in the county, Ginny takes in a grand tour of Weston Park House, finding out about its influential people of the past and the rare artefacts in its collection.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Love is in the air on a house hunt full of surprises as Nicki Chapman joins a couple who have £450,000 to find a rural home in Somerset with some income potential in the form of a holiday let.Nicki also dons her waders on a conservation mission to reduce the numbers of non-native, invasive crayfish threatening the local wildlife in Exmoor National Park.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Margherita Taylor is helping a couple with a £300,000 budget find a country property which gives them community on their doorstep and a crash pad for their grandchildren to stay during the holidays.Margherita also meets a Devon stovemaker and finds out the practical and environmental benefits of this popular country home interior feature.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is in Shropshire with a military couple armed with a £500,000 budget and an ambition to enjoy country life with their young daughter.Since Shropshire is dubbed the birthplace of the Industrial Revolution, keen cyclist Jonnie meets a master bike-frame builder in his warehouse workshop and sees modern-day precision engineering in action.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in the Dorset countryside with a couple who have an £800,000 budget to buy their first home together.While in the county, Jules finds out how Dorset's ancient hedgerows at Kingcombe provide vital natural 'motorways' for wildlife, and he helps plant new specimens alongside some that date back a thousand years.

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in rural Worcestershire helping a couple who have £450,000 to realise their dream of raising their young family in the countryside.Along the way, Nicki joins the volunteers of the Severn Valley Railway, whose passion and dedication has helped keep this historic steam railway line running for over 50 years.

videos.title: Ceredigion
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton harnesses his positive energy for a house-hunting mission in the Welsh county of Ceredigion, as he helps a couple with a £355,000 budget buy a country home with the potential for a spiritual retreat Along the way, Alistair heads to Llandysul to meet a dynamic dairy-farming family. They have successfully diversified and now produce a local teifi cheese, as well as a botanical gin, both of which Alistair is keen to sample.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman heads to Cornwall to help a Croydon-based couple with a £450,000 budget and a love of the great outdoors find their perfect country home.Nicki also discovers how one Cornish farm is running with a national initiative to create a food enterprise zone. She samples first-hand how Norton Barton Farm hopes to become a food artisan village for local producers.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is helping a pair of ex-pats who are raring to return to their roots in North Yorkshire and have a £700,000 budget to find their ideal rural home.While in the region, Jules gets into the hot seat of a First World War fighter plane when he learns about Yorkshire's vital role in aviation heritage.

videos.title: South Devon
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is on a house-hunting mission in the South Devon countryside with a recently retired couple who have a £540,000 budget to up sticks from Burton upon Trent and relocate to live closer to their daughter.While in the area, Alistair learns how the Devon Wildlife Trust is joining forces with the UK National Tree Seed Project and harvesting seed samples from woodlands to safeguard the future of thousands of British tree species so they avoid the risk of extinction.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is house hunting in the Northumberland countryside with a couple wanting to escape busy urban life in Gateshead and who have a £500,000 budget to move three generations of the family into a new rural home that provides them with a peaceful quality of life.Along the way, Jonnie visits Bamburgh Castle, home to the ancient kings of Northumbria. While taking in some of its illustrious history, he also lends a helping hand with the year-round conservation tasks necessary to maintain one of the county's most iconic heritage buildings.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Herefordshire with an exuberant house-hunting couple who are ready to up sticks from Birmingham and spend £500,000 on a country home that allows them to lead the good life while being close enough to Hereford for regular visits to their daughter.While in the county, Jules visits a family-run blacksmiths that forges commissioned pieces for historic buildings, and he takes to the anvil to make a wrought iron accessory for his own home.

videos.title: Yorkshire Dales
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in the Yorkshire Dales helping a fitness enthusiast first-time buyer armed with £280,000 and the moral support of his mother find a home where he can run free in the countryside.While in the area, Alistair learns about the efforts to increase the number of native Dales ponies, currently a critically endangered breed. He also takes to the reins and enjoys a ride through the countryside the breed is historically linked with.

videos.title: Peak District
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is rural property shopping in the Peak District with a couple who have a £500,000 pound budget to buy their first home together.Along the way, Nicki pays a visit to Reaseheath Agricultural College to meet the next generation of farmers in the throes of their study. She can't resist joining them on lambing duties when she meets some of the new arrivals.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in the Kent helping a dynamic international couple with a £1 million pound budget branch out from city life in London, so they can raise their young family in the countryside.While in the county, Alistair heads to the atmospheric area of Romney Marsh to meet a sixth-generation farmer still rearing the native Romney sheep breed with his wife, who has grown a spin-off rural business creating handmade woollen textiles.

videos.title: East Devon
videos.overview: Margherita Taylor is on an important house-hunting mission with an intrepid house buyer who has a £340,000 budget and is keen to make the lifestyle leap to the countryside around the Devon/Dorset border that she and her late husband had always dreamed of.Whilst in the area, Margherita hones her coastal foraging skills and is able to prepare a meal from the edible ingredients she has gathered.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in the Somerset countryside helping a house-hunting couple with £475,000 to return to their roots and recreate the outdoor lifestyle that they grew up with for their own young children.Whilst in the county, Nicki visits a farm which has diversified into making vegetable yoghurts and, before long, is given free rein to invent her own unique flavour.

videos.title: Lake District
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is on a country property hunt in Cumbria with a triathlete couple armed with £400,000. They need a family home for them and their three children before the new school term starts.While in the area, Alistair also visits Stott Park Bobbin Mill, the last working example in the UK, and learns the important role it played supplying a quarter of a million bobbins every week to the Victorian cotton mills of Lancashire.

videos.title: Forest of Dean
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is tasked with a property-searching mission in the Forest of Dean, helping a house-hunting couple with a £475,000 budget find a home to accommodate three generations of their family.Along the way, Jonnie ventures underground to explore the area's rich ochre-mining heritage and learns more about how this valuable pigment is still in demand today.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Wiltshire with a couple of motorbike enthusiasts who want to find a home that gives the perfect balance of community and country life on their £650,000 budget.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is on a house-hunting mission in the Somerset countryside with a keen gardening couple who have £700,000 pounds and high hopes of enjoying the county's mild climate.Away from the property search, Jules meets Sally Tuffin, a former London fashion designer turned ceramics artist, and sees how her creative work is inspired by her rural Somerset surroundings.

videos.title: Pembrokeshire

videos.title: North Yorkshire

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Margherita Taylor heads to the Cotswolds with a house-hunting couple who have a £550,000 budget and a dream of swapping coastal life in Southend-on-Sea, Essex, for views of rolling countryside.Along the way, Margherita visits Westonbirt, The National Arboretum where the annual arboricultural show is in full swing, and sees tree experts putting a range of impressive skills into action.

videos.title: Northern Ireland

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is on a house-hunting mission in the Kent countryside with a strong-minded couple who have a £900,000 budget and completely different views on the style of the large family home they want to buy.While in the county, Nicki gains an insight into Kent's cricketing heritage by seeing the impressive craftsmanship involved in producing handmade cricket bats.

videos.title: Norfolk

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is country property-shopping in Somerset with a couple who have already sold up and are desperate to invest £425,000 in their perfect rural retreat after months of staying with friends.While in the south west, Nicki visits Dunkeswell Aerodrome, a former RAF airbase which is now a civilian airfield, where she takes to the skies in a microlight and sees the countryside from a completely different perspective.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley heads to North Yorkshire with an intrepid couple who want to escape the city and spend their £800,000 budget on a country property with impressive views and an income potential that will help fund their new lifestyle.Ginny visits the village of Malham where a passionate female blacksmith has forged a place for herself in the county's blacksmithing heritage.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is on an emotional house-hunting journey in Shropshire with a retired civil servant couple who have £450,000 to invest in their dream country home.Along the way, Jonnie heads to Ironbridge Gorge and visits the Coalport China Museum, the historic home of the famous factory which produced beautiful bone china until the 1920s.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in rural Devon with an ambitious couple looking for a large country home and as much acreage as their £1.25 million budget will afford them.While in the area, Jules heads to the banks of the River Otter to find out why beavers have made a surprise reappearance there, having been extinct in the UK for the past five hundred years.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is on a high-energy house-hunt in the Norfolk countryside helping a couple quit their urban life in London and find a character family home with their £400,000 budget.Away from search, Jonnie meets a record-breaking carriage driver whose passengers have included royalty. Under his supervision, Jonnie takes to the reins to try his hand at mastering some carriage-driving skills.

videos.title: South Wales

videos.title: Monmouthshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is tasked with helping a couple who have a £500,000 budget and a dream of leaving their city life in Bristol behind them and finding their perfect country home in Monmouthshire.While in the county, keen archaeologist Jules visits the village of Trellech, where local excavation efforts are unearthing what could be the largest medieval settlement in Wales.

videos.title: Argyll and Bute
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is property hunting in Argyll and Bute with a couple from Ayr who want to invest their £350,000 budget in a property with priceless countryside views.While in the region, Jonnie heads to the shores of Loch Fyne and visits Inveraray Castle, one of Scotland's finest stately homes and ancestral seat of the Dukes of Argyll for the past 300 years.

videos.title: Forest of Dean
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is on a house-hunting mission in the Forest of Dean helping a couple with a £500,000 budget find a perfect country home that meets their specific demands for the garden.While in the area, Sonali visits Ragmans Lane Farm and discovers how market gardening produces not just organic food, but is also a financial leg-up for small-scale veg growers trying to break into the farming industry.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in rural Shropshire with a couple who hope their £500,000 budget will buy them a shorter commute to work and more quality time together to enjoy the outdoors. Alistair meets Sam Gray, a passionate smallholder, who rears her rare breed pigs ethically and balances the business of farming with raising her young family.

videos.title: Lincolnshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley heads to rural Lincolnshire to help a couple with a £500,000 budget find a country home that they feel a strong connection with.Away from the search, Ginny visits Lincoln Cathedral, which has stood for nearly one thousand years, and discovers the huge scale behind the conservation plans to safeguard its long-term future.

videos.title: Pembrokeshire

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in rural Gloucestershire to help an intrepid aunt and niece find a country home. With a budget of £600,000, they are looking for a house for two generations that can also furnish them with an income.Along the way, Nicki heads to Owlpen Manor, hearing the story of how this Cotswold Tudor building was rescued from its 'sleeping beauty' state after 100 years of disrepair, and restored by the family who now call it home.

videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in the Cornish countryside house hunting with a couple planning an escape from the busy suburbs of Surrey, hoping to move their family of five to rural Cornwall on a £350,000 budget.Alistair also heads to West Cornwall's rugged coast and courageously joins a team of passionate seaweed collectors to dive and harvest this edible, sustainable superfood.

videos.title: East Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a woman searching for a coastal property in east Devon on a budget of £300,000, and also witnesses the Axminster Cherry Fayre, which has recently been revived.

videos.title: West Yorkshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple with a budget of £550,000 in West Yorkshire, who wish to be close to a vibrant community, and visits the former home of the Bronte sisters in Haworth.

videos.title: North Wales
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is in North Wales with a mother who has a £295,000 budget and would like to move close to her daughter, who has already made her escape to the area.Away from the house hunt, Sonali heads to Blaenau Ffestiniog and rides the zip line, one of the highpoints of adventure tourism which is making its mark in this former slate mining area.

videos.title: North Devon
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps a couple searching for a property in North Devon on a budget of £1.1 million, and also rides on the Lynton and Lynmouth funicular cliff railway.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Sonali Shah helps a couple in the Norfolk countryside who are looking for their first house together, and hopes they can find a property near the coast for their £375,000 budget.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps a Co Durham couple hoping to move to North Yorkshire on a budget of £600,000, and also gets a masterclass in building dry stone walls.

videos.title: North Cornwall
videos.overview: Sonali Shah visits Cornwall to help a couple with a love of the coast find a home in the Cornish countryside on a £350,000 budget. She also heads to Tintagel Island.

videos.title: Warwickshire
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is in the Warwickshire countryside helping a couple with a £750,000 budget find their ideal home, where an open-plan interior and a generous garden are priorities.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps an active couple return to their roots in Shropshire, looking for a property to meet their £350,000 budget, and heads into the Shropshire Hills.

videos.title: Lincolnshire
videos.overview: Margherita Taylor heads to rural Lincolnshire with a decisive mother and son-in-law to help them find a comfortable country property for £650,000 to house three generations of their family, as well as providing a home for their much-loved horses. While the search gathers pace, Margherita takes in the splendour of Grimsthorpe Castle, the last stately home built by the famous early 18th-century country house architect Sir John Vanbrugh.

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson takes the reins of a rural property search in Gloucestershire with a horse-loving husband and wife who have a £1.2 million budget and a desire to upscale their country lifestyle. Along the way, Jules visits the Cotswold herb garden of Davina Wynne-Jones, daughter of late renowned garden designer Rosemary Verey, from whom the Prince of Wales sought advice for his gardens at Highgrove.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is helping a couple with a £400,000 budget fulfil their dream of escaping to the Norfolk countryside and find a home where top priorities are a large kitchen and space for them to keep rescue animals. While in the county, Nicki visits the National Collection of Lavender at Caley Mill, home to over a hundred different lavender varieties, where she takes in the spectacular sight of the fields in full bloom.

videos.title: South Wales

While in the region, Margherita heads to the Gower Peninsula and walks the marshland around the Burry Estuary with a sheep farmer whose family looks after their enormous flock in this challenging tidal landscape, producing lamb with a very unique provenance in the process.

Away from their garden-focused house hunt, Jules visits Mottisfont Abbey and is treated to a tour of the historic rose garden, home to a collection of over 700 different varieties, some of which are rare and centuries old.

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is on a house-hunting mission in rural Worcestershire with a couple who want their £475,000 pounds to buy them a characterful family home that delivers 'wow factor' and the potential to work from home. Nicki has picked a perfect time to be in the county, as she gets to see how harvesting fields of delphiniums to make flower confetti is both a blooming business and a riot of colour on one historic family farm.

videos.title: East Midlands

videos.title: Herefordshire

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is in the Shropshire countryside to help a couple who have £425,000 to invest in a character home, and also visits the Royal Air Force Museum Cosford.

videos.overview: Jules Hudson is on a property-searching mission spanning Somerset and Devon's Exmoor National Park with a couple who have £550,000 and a love of carpentry and the coast.

videos.title: Yorkshire Dales
videos.overview: Margherita Taylor is rural property-shopping in the Yorkshire Dales with a retired head teacher who has £400,000 to invest in her leap to the country and has signed up her daughter to help her with the decision making.Away from a high-energy house hunt, Margherita discovers how one Dales company has recently been instrumental in reviving Britain's handmade piano heritage, an echo of production glory days during the 1920s.

videos.title: Peak District
videos.overview: Jules Hudson heads to the Peak District with an expat couple returning from the Netherlands to their family roots and want their generous £1.5 million budget to provide comfortable accommodation for their visiting mothers.While in the region, Jules stops off in Edale to meet a professional wooden spoon carver who has inherited her father's award-winning passion and talent for creating handcrafted wooden design pieces.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin helps a couple find a home in the Shropshire countryside, and pays a visit to the recently restored 18th-century walled garden at Apley Estate.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a London couple on their country house hunt in Wiltshire. They need their £1 million budget to afford them space for a baby grand piano and assorted classic cars.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton travels to North Yorkshire for today's house hunt where he is tasked with finding a forever home for a couple of keen caravaners who have £300,000 to spend.Aside from the crop of rural properties, Alistair accompanies a local producer on a hedgerow harvest to fill a basket with berries used to flavour sloe gin.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is scouring Somerset's rural property market with a fun-loving couple who have a £400,000 budget and a desire to quit living in a Surrey commuter town to free up more time for their hobbies in their new country home.Along the way Nicki discovers the science of how bacteria are a vital part in the process of making original Cheddar cheese.

videos.title: Perthshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin heads to the Perthshire countryside to help a house-hunting couple with a £550,000 budget relocate from the city of Dundee and find a rural retreat with views, along with space for a cinema room.Jonnie also stops off at the British School of Falconry based at Gleneagles and learns the exhilarating basics of how to be a falconer from its founder.

videos.title: Welsh Borders
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton visits the Welsh borders to help a couple who have a healthy budget of £775,000 to find a countryside home to raise their young son and establish a glamping retreat business.Alistair also finds himself in a forest of fruit trees when he visits a perry and cider farm to find out about the region's drinks-making heritage.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is on a house-hunting mission in rural Devon with a couple who want their budget of £475,000 to give them much more for their money than their young family currently have in the London suburbs.While in the county, Jules heads into the Blackdown Hills and discovers how 25,000 pairs of fine mohair socks are produced every year from one farm's herd of angora goats.

videos.title: Warwickshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton travels to the Warwickshire countryside to help a couple with a £600,000 budget finds a rural home for them and their two young daughters.While in the region, Alistair visits one of the country's last surviving water mills still running commercially and meets a miller harnessing the natural power of the River Avon to produce his flour.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Sonali Shah goes property shopping in rural Devon with a couple who have a £350,000 budget and high hopes of finding a country home that has a workshop for him and an art studio for her. While in the county, Sonali joins a family of wheelwrights dedicated to preserving the dying craft and responsible for repairing the wooden wheels on the Queen's carriages.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: After long and demanding careers in the emergency services, this pair of house hunters are after a change of scenery in the Norfolk countryside. Jonnie Irwin guides them on their rural property tour, showing them some fantastic homes available for their £900k budget.Jonnie also pays a visit to 15th-century manor house Oxburgh Hall and learns the tricks of the trade used for its 21st-century restoration.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Jules Hudson scours Somerset's rural property market with an enthusiastic business-minded couple who have £650,000 to invest in their new life in the countryside.While in the county, Jules also visits the apple orchards of Barrington Court, and after ploughing his efforts into pressing apples, he is rewarded with a taste of their traditional cider.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley helps a young and expanding family to escape the city and find some space and tranquility in the Hampshire countryside with their healthy £800k budget.Away from the house hunt, Ginny explores the county's rich maritime heritage on board the armoured battleship HMS Warrior, the pride of Queen Victoria's fleet.

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin goes house hunting with couple who have a healthy £900k budget and want to start a new life closer to loved ones in the Worcestershire countryside.Jonnie also visits brine springs at Droitwich Spa to meet a family breathing new life into the region's salt heritage for the first time in a century.

videos.overview: Sonali Shah in on the search for a rural home in the Derbyshire Peak District with a couple of soon-to-be retirees who have a budget of £500,000, and for whom a pond is a high priority.Away from the house hunt, Sonali gets battle ready when she meets a master armourer and his apprentice who are upholding the tradition of this metalwork craft.

videos.title: Isle of Arran
videos.overview: Jules Hudson heads to the Isle of Arran to house-hunt with a novelist and her husband who are in search of writing inspiration from the Scottish wilderness for their £375,000 budget.Along the way, Jules discovers the positive benefits to Arran's marine habitats and the local fishing industry since Scotland's first ‘No Take Zone' was introduced.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is on a property-searching mission in the Devon countryside, helping a mother and daughter duo with £750,0000 find a home for three generations of their family and an eco-camping business.Alistair also visits Chagford Community Farm, one of the UK's first community-supported micro-dairies and sees how residents are readily signing up to buying its local produce.

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is on a forensic house hunt in rural Gloucestershire with a retired detective and his wife who want their £500,000 budget to furnish them with a charming Cotswold home.While in the county, Jules goes behind the scenes in the run-up to the Badminton Horse Trials, an annual highlight in the world's equestrian sports calendar.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is in the county of Shropshire in search of a country home for a pair of free spirits who have a £300 000 budget with which to finally lay down some roots.Jonnie also gets in the saddle on a ride through the Shropshire hills with a bespoke bike builder.

videos.title: Isle of Wight
videos.overview: Jules Hudson crosses the Solent to property shop on the Isle of Wight with a couple who have a £750 000 budget to find their dream island home with holiday-let potential. During his journey, Jules gets an intimate glimpse into 19th-century royal life when he visits Osbourne House, one of Queen Victoria's favourite homes.

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin reviews a range of Gloucestershire country properties as he helps a green-fingered couple armed with an £800,000 budget find their perfect retreat with plenty of space to enjoy their hobbies.While in the county, Jonnie heads to Berkeley Castle and hears intriguing and murderous tales from owner Charles Berkeley, whose family has lived here for almost 900 years.

videos.title: North Yorkshire

They are calling time on running a guest house in the city and have a £650 000 budget to find a rural family home with business potential.Whilst in the county, Alistair also pays a visit to a heritage train line and helps the team to get their impressive locomotives fired up for the start of the tourist season.

videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is helping a couple with a £400,000 budget escape to the Shropshire countryside in a bid to improve their young daughter's quality of life and reconnect with family roots.While in the county, Alistair becomes an apprentice under the watchful eye of a master craftsman who handmakes horse harnesses and collars and then puts them to the test on a horse, ploughing a field the Victorian way.

videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is in rural Norfolk, helping a couple who have an £800k budget to buy their very first property together.Along the way, Jonnie takes a ride on a narrow gauge steam train when he meets the enthusiasts keeping the Bure Valley Railway on track.

videos.overview: On today's country relocation in Pembrokeshire, Alistair Appleton is helping a couple with a £325k budget to find a rural home for their retirement.Whilst in Wales, Alistair also visits an upland farm to discover the challenges and advantages of rearing native South Wales Mountain sheep.

videos.overview: Jules Hudson travels to the Leicestershire countryside to help a couple with a £750k budget find a rural home close to their family.Whilst exploring the county's bricks and mortar, Jules pays a visit to a beautiful arts and crafts cottage preserved as a time capsule from a bygone era.

videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is on property hunting mission with a couple who have a £750k budget to make a move from the Essex coast to the Suffolk countryside.Aside from houses, Jonnie ventures into fields of golden rapeseed to find out how the oil of this humble plant has fast become a store cupboard staple.

videos.overview: Sonali Shah delves into the depths of the Dorset countryside on a mission to find a rural retreat for a couple who have a £750 000 budget with which to buy a home, a holiday let and land.Away from property, Sonali visits a farm that is cultivating the farmers of the future by helping the county's younger generation to fulfil their full potential.

videos.overview: Margherita Taylor is on a property romp around rural Shropshire helping her house hunters with £425,000 to find a country home which they'll hopefully fall in love with and buy.Margherita also delves into the county's industrial past with a trip to the Ironbridge Gorge, where she discovers the speed and skill needed to cut it as a clay pipe maker back in the 19th century.

videos.title: Essex
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is in the Essex countryside helping a church minister and his wife to make their very first house purchase with their £425,000 budget.Away from property, Sonali discovers how conservation and engineering have partnered to create a landmark coastal nature reserve.

videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Devon on a house hunting mission with a professional singer who has a £670,000 budget to buy a country home that hits the right note. videos.title: Suffolk

videos.overview: Margherita Taylor is in Somerset with a couple on their maiden house hunt together. They have £550,000 to find a rural home with space to park their beloved caravan. Whilst in the county, Margherita finds out how the landscape inspired one of our greatest poet when she visits the cottage that Samuel Taylor Coleridge once called home.

videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in rural Somerset with a couple of family-focused sport enthusiasts who have a £1 million budget with which to buy a country home with views and a garden for football.While in the county, Alistair also learns the endangered craft of handmaking paper and sees how it's been championed by the same family for four generations.

videos.overview: Sonali Shah is in Shropshire with a garlic specialist and his Russian wife who want to establish a new business that taps into the county's thriving food scene, but not before securing their dream family home in the country on a £550 000 budget.While in the county, Sonali gets in tune with the region's melodic heritage when she learns about the expert craft of harp-making.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is in Somerset helping a couple with a £310,000 budget find a country home where character charm and a practical utility room are top of the wish list. Along the way,Ginny heads into the Somerset Levels to see how bird wildlife efforts have brought the endangered crane back from near extinction.

videos.title: Devon

videos.title: Chiltern Hills
videos.overview: Today, a young married couple are looking to escape London's Docklands and move to the beautiful Chiltern Hills of Buckinghamshire. Guided by Ginny Buckley, and with a healthy budget of £850,000, they want to realise their dream of raising their family with more room inside and more green space out.The property search happens to fall in the same week as the Henley Regatta, where Ginny gets behind the scenes with rowing royalty at this famous societal sporting event.

videos.title: Derbyshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Derbyshire with a recently married couple making an epic location shift, swapping the Blue Mountains in Australia for the wilds of the Peak District. They have a significant budget of £750,000 and have their hearts set on a character home with a large garden for their three dogs.Elsewhere, Jules comes across an unlikely centre of manufacturing nestled in the county's rural countryside.

videos.title: Carmarthenshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is house hunting with a couple who are looking to return to their Welsh homeland after twenty years of living in Oxford. The pair have a budget of £450,000 to find the right home in Carmarthenshire with enough land to accommodate visiting friends and their pooches.Elsewhere, Ginny samples a regional delicacy at Britain's only manufacturer of pickled cockles.

videos.title: Yorkshire Dales
videos.overview: Jules Hudson teams up with a couple of keen horticulturalists who have £450,000 with which to find their ideal country home in the Yorkshire Dales, with the garden a top priority.Making the most of his time in Yorkshire, Jules also tests his own green fingers when he visits RHS Garden Harlow Carr for some top tips from none other than gardening guru Alan Titchmarsh.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley presents an arresting range of houses to a couple who have a substantial budget of £700,000 and are hoping to relocate their family to the wonderful Norfolk countryside.For over half a century, Norfolk has been home to Lotus cars, so whilst in the county Ginny finds out more about the company heritage before catching a glimpse of the future when their latest hypercar is unveiled.

videos.title: Shropshire and Herefordshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman heads to the counties of Shropshire and Herefordshire to help a recently retired couple with a £550,000 budget find a dream country home that's full of traditional period charm.Away from the property search, Nicki meets enthusiasts who reach for the sky when she visits the Weston Park Model Air Show.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton guides a pair of budding entrepreneurs who want to escape to the Cotswolds. They have a generous £900,000 to play with, but the property must have the potential to develop a boutique country holiday let.Alistair also spends an exhilarating day at the University of Bath as he launches himself on to the UK's only bobsleigh and skeleton push-start track.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Heading west from Surrey to Devon, a young couple who met as students need Nicki Chapman's help to find them a sizeable home to fit three generations of their family, and all for a budget of £800,000.In addition, Nicki spends time on the county's south coast, meeting a local fisherman and sampling the delicious catch of the day.

videos.title: East Riding of Yorkshire
videos.overview: Armed with a top budget of £450,000, Jules Hudson property shops with a couple wanting to make a permanent move from Kent to the scenic East Riding of Yorkshire. They are in search of a house with space for a burgeoning catering business.Jules also heads to Bridlington, where he tests his sea legs in a traditional fishing boat unique to the area.

videos.title: Surrey
videos.overview: A health-conscious couple from London enlist Sonali Shah to help them spend £1.3million on a detached property in Surrey with enough land to create a wellness retreat.Taking a breather from house hunting, Sonali immerses herself in the county's ancient woodlands as she learns about the Japanese practice of forest bathing.

videos.title: Pembrokeshire
videos.overview: An escapee from Surrey challenges Alistair Appleton to find her the perfect property in a county and a country she's never been to before, Pembrokeshire in Wales. For a very top budget of £900,000, the wish list includes a remote period house with spectacular views.Alistair takes time away from the property search to visit a forward-thinking farm which specialises in edible insects.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: With a budget of £450,000, a married couple looking to uproot from Greater Manchester seek the help of Jules Hudson to find a new family home close to the coast in glorious Dorset.Jules is in his element when he meets one of the county's blacksmiths, who specialises in restoring relics of bygone eras using traditional techniques.

videos.title: Lake District
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple from Newcastle who want to turn the spectacular Lake District from a holiday destination into their permanent home. With a budget of £750,000, they are looking for a property with fabulous views and enough space for visiting family.Alistair also takes to the water when he meets a passionate boat builder who restored what is thought to be the oldest passenger ferry in the world.

videos.title: Rutland
videos.overview: In England's smallest county, Rutland, a couple from Buckinghamshire with a budget of £500,000 ask Steve Brown and the team to find them a detached property with a garden big enough for a vegetable patch.Continuing the horticultural theme, Steve visits Barnsdale Gardens to see for himself the legacy left by one of the country's best loved gardeners, the late Geoff Hamilton.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is in Devon, accompanying a married couple from Berkshire with an impressive budget of £1,200,000. On today's property shopping list is a five-bedroom detached property with land where their four children can enjoy the great outdoors.Away from the house hunt, Sonali visits a farm where she discovers that flowers are not the only way to her heart. Edible flowers are too.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: A couple from Bedfordshire with a budget of £450,000 need Ginny Buckley's help in Norfolk to find them the first house they are buying together. They would like a character property with a good-sized garden for some new canine companions.Ginny also heads to Great Yarmouth, where she straps in for a white-knuckle ride on one of the country's last remaining wooden rollercoasters.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Steve Brown showcases some tempting properties to a young couple of keen cyclists who have a budget of £600,000 to make the move from London to the beautiful countryside of North Yorkshire.Steve also meets a truly inspirational, award-winning cheese maker from Syria who's brought a taste of home to the British countryside.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: The stakes are high for Jules Hudson as he helps a couple wanting to uproot from Essex to find a modest cottage in Cornwall to call their forever home. The two nurses have a budget of £340,000 for a property with character in a rural location.Jules also heads inland to inspect a plantation of trees normally found down under, and for the first time in his life, he tries an oyster!

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in Norfolk with a couple from Northamptonshire who have previously lived and worked all over the world. With a whopping £1 million to spend, the globetrotting pair want a property with the wow factor and spectacular views to boot.On the beach, Nicki helps a local chef to cook a classic dish, using seasonal shellfish from the nearby coast.

videos.title: Staffordshire
videos.overview: A recently retired couple looking to downsize from their Essex home head to Staffordshire with Sonali Shah hoping to find peace, pubs and a detached home with a view.Sonali also visits a celebrated Victorian pottery that is now a modern-day hub of art, design and training.

videos.title: North Wales
videos.overview: Two retired police officers with £600,000 explore the breathtaking landscapes of North Wales on a house-hunting expedition with Jules Hudson. The couple want a traditional Welsh home with at least an acre of land.Jules also tests his nerve and takes the plunge when he experiences one of the region's many extreme water sports.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton tempts a newlywed Olympian and his wife to part with up to £525,000 for one of three fabulous properties on offer in wonderful Wiltshire.Away from the house hunt, Alistair's ball skills are challenged as he tries his hand at the little-known sport of stické tennis.

videos.title: North West Wales
videos.overview: In the stunning landscapes of north west Wales, Sonali Shah meets a couple from Warwickshire who have a dream of owning a property that would provide them with a home and the ability to offer holiday lets.Whilst in the region, Sonali meets a paddle-boarding campaigner helping to rid the area of plastic pollution.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: In the Cotswolds, Sonali Shah showcases three fabulous properties to a couple from Essex who are hoping their budget of £550,000 will buy them a new home with three bedrooms, one of which could be used as a home office.Sonali also visits a local quarry from which Cotswold stone is supplied for use in new builds and conservation projects.

videos.title: High Weald
videos.overview: A young, canine-loving couple from Hertfordshire are hoping for a fresh start in a new High Weald home and, with their budget of £600,000, Ginny Buckley has some tempting properties to show them. Away from the houses, Ginny gets to grip picking some of the local grape harvest, before treating herself to a glass of fizz.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a buyer who wants to relocate herself and her dog-grooming business to Suffolk with a budget of £320,000.Jules also takes a step into the past when he meets the team behind an exciting and ambitious project to recreate an Anglo-Saxon longship, the remains of which were unearthed by an amateur archaeologist in the 1930s.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is in Wiltshire with a young couple from London looking for a new home to house them and their 5 guinea pigs. They have £600,000 to spend and would like enough land for some more, somewhat larger animals.Whilst in the county, Ginny also goes on an inland fossil hunt before helping to transform one prehistoric piece into stylish jewellery.

videos.title: Welsh Borders
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is on home ground in the Welsh Borders as he showcases some tempting houses to a retired couple who have a whopping £1 million to spend. Along with a characterful property, they are after somewhere with holiday-let potential or space for a glamping business.Jules is also in his element when he meets experts in traditional construction methods, who are keeping heritage building skills alive.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: A young Essex couple need Nicki Chapman's help to find them a new home in lovely Somerset. They have £725,000 to spend on a property for their growing family, preferably one that has some income potential.Nicki also visits a local farm to sample some homemade specialties made from its crop of an ancient grain, spelt.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Returning home from South Africa, today's buyer has a budget of £450,000 and heads west to Cornwall with Steve Brown to find a character property that has holiday let potential. Steve also pays a visit to the Newlyn Copper Works and has a bash at transforming the striking reddish metal into a delicate work of art.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: In his treasured home county of Herefordshire, Jules Hudson presents some fabulous, rural properties to a couple from Kent who have a budget of £700,000.Away from the houses, Jules meets two farmers who turn their potato crop into tasty crisps which are sold inside innovative compostable packets.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Sonali Shah showcases some superb Somerset properties to a couple who have a budget of £700,000 and want a countryside home where they can upgrade an allotment to their very own back garden veggie patch.Sonali also learns about the potentially perilous Bristol Channel and meets the volunteers who operate two life-saving rescue hovercrafts.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is on hand to help an artist find a period property in Hampshire with potential for a painting studio and a garden in which to practise yoga.Away from the property hunt, Nicki visits the South Downs National Park and gets involved in a tree-planting initiative to mark the park's tenth anniversary.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: A couple wanting to make a new start in Devon enlist Jules Hudson's house-hunting know-how to find a detached, family home with a large garden for their two young children and some income potential.Whilst in the county, Jules gets stuck into some woodcraft using nothing but steam to sculpt some impressive interior design pieces.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: There's an urgent need for Alistair Appleton to find today's buyers a new home in stunning Shropshire, as they have just sold their current house in Essex. For their budget of £375,000, the couple would like a detached property with a big kitchen for baking and a large garden for growing fruit.Alistair also visits a sustainable Shropshire flower farm and attempts to design a wedding bouquet.

videos.title: Essex
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley meets a couple of Londoners who have a massive £1million to spend on a detached property in the Essex countryside with lots of space for family and friends.On a break from the house tours, Ginny visits a farmer who has found that the county's unique climate has enabled him to grow a crop usually found much further afield.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Sonali Shah helps a married couple who, after 40 years in the same house, are upping sticks to find their ideal rural property in Somerset for a £425k budget.Away from the countryside, Sonali heads for a town high street to visit a shop that is challenging customers to think about their shopping habits in a bid to reduce packaging and food waste.

videos.title: Surrey
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin is with a young couple wanting to escape London to build a new life in the Surrey countryside. They're hoping that their great £900,000 budget finds them a large home for their growing family that's close to good schools, with convenient links to the capital.Jonnie also gets to grips with a bat when he joins a local baseball team to try out America's national pastime, which can trace its roots back to the county.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: In the Cotswolds, Nicki Chapman and a couple from Scotland don't need to look too far to find the characterful cottage of their dreams for a £600,000 budget.Whist in the region, Nicki drops in on show jumping legend and double Olympic gold medalist Nick Skelton, along with his sons Harry and Dan, who are following in their father's ‘hoof' prints.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: A musical couple from London need Steve Brown's help to unearth a new home in the Oxfordshire countryside. On the £950,000 shopping list is a detached property with space for a studio and good links to the capital.Away from house hunting, Steve checks out a dairy farm and samples kefir, purportedly an ancient, health giving drink made from fermented milk.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: A retired army couple looking to escape busy Bedfordshire enlist Margherita Taylor to help them spend their house hunting budget of £680,000 in the rural wilds of Norfolk. On the wish list are three bedrooms, some land, a potential income and seclusion.Taking a break from the properties, Margherita learns about the world's most expensive spice, saffron.

videos.title: Dumfries & Galloway
videos.overview: Sonali Shah visits spectacular Scotland, making her way to Dumfries and Galloway with a married couple from London who are seeking a life-changing move. They're hoping their £350,000 budget can buy a house for them with enough land for a retreat business.Sonali also visits an ethical dairy farm that has written a brand new rule book when it comes to animal welfare.

videos.title: Wiltshire and Somerset
videos.overview: Travelling through the counties of Wiltshire and Somerset, Jonnie Irwin is helping a pair of early retirees to spend their whopping £1.3million budget on an impressive home in the countryside. They are after a characterful and spacious period property with at least four bedrooms and separate studies, but the most vital feature turns out to be sky high ceilings!

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: With ambitions to start a cookery school in Shropshire, a couple from Hertfordshire get a helping hand from Nicki Chapman to spend £900,000 on a new home for their new life in the country. Getting to know the area and local producers, they all visit a small farm which supplies veggies to local restaurants and cafes.

videos.title: West Wales
videos.overview: Jules Hudson joins a couple from Cambridgeshire for a packed few days in west Wales, skimming stones, learning Welsh and meeting a chef from France who loves to whip up tasty dishes using locally made mead. Jules even has time to help the couple look for a three-bedroom home with a holiday let or annexe and an acre of land, all for a budget of £425,000.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton gets a lesson in feng shui from today's buyer who is looking to move from Greater London to a country cottage in the picturesque Cotswolds. Alistair also meets a group of artists drawing inspiration from the magnificent trees at Westonbirt Arboretum.

videos.title: Dumfries and Galloway
videos.overview: In Dumfries and Galloway, Steve Brown helps a house buyer from the Lake District to find a home for her, her husband, their cat and not one but twelve motorcycles. The budget? £350,000 for a detached, rural home with at least a double garage.Whilst there, Steve crashes a wedding and discovers why Gretna Green is the wedding capital of the country.

videos.title: Cambridgeshire
videos.overview: Cambridgeshire keeps Nicki Chapman and a couple from London busy visiting a bespoke garden office, a co-housing development and a local florist, in between searching for a new house to entertain in. The young buyers are hopeful their budget of £850,000 will buy them a three-bedroom property with his and hers workspaces.

videos.title: Cheshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Cheshire, helping a couple from Liverpool find an open-plan, three-bedroom house. Jules also meets a pampered pooch as well as local legend and internet sensation Jackie Weaver. It's also wild garlic picking season, so there are some tasty, garlicky treats on offer too.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: The bluebells are out in Devon as Sonali Shah helps a young couple search for a new home with enough land to start a glamping business. Along with the properties, they check out a lovely shepherd's hut and a luxury treehouse.Sonali also visits a farm that grows a number of delicious lettuce varieties without using soil.

videos.title: Derbyshire
videos.overview: A London couple are swapping the sound of the Bow bells for cow bells, as Jules Hudson helps them to spend their £500,000 budget on a house with a music room and a dog-friendly garden in the Derbyshire countryside.Whilst there, they meet one of the county's silver bands, and Jules works up an appetite as he harvests some delicious mushrooms cultivated in an old converted mill.

videos.title: Argyll & Bute
videos.overview: A couple from the Surrey town of Epsom enjoy the spectacular landscape in Argyll and Bute as Nicki Chapman provides them with some expert property advice. For their budget of £600,000 they want a house with views that just keep on giving.Nicki also takes to the water on Loch Lomond, meeting a family who have owned and lived on an island for 70 years.

videos.title: Northamptonshire
videos.overview: Having recently returned from Bermuda, today's couple are bracing themselves for an exploration of Northamptonshire's property, people and places, guided by Steve Brown. Steve also meets a social media influencer and a local food producer, some of whose secret spicy recipes were handed down by her grandmother.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: With their entire belongings in two rucksacks, today's couple have spent the last six years travelling the globe. With £325,000, the pair have decided they need a base in the Wiltshire countryside, and Alistair Appleton is the man to show them what this gorgeous county has to offer.Alistair also meets an intensive care nurse at her much loved and fruitful allotment.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Wanting to be closer to a new grandson, a buyer from the Gloucestershire town of Tewkesbury asks Jules Hudson to help her find a new home in the Suffolk countryside for £450,000.Enjoying the best of spring, with the bluebells in bloom, Jules visits a care farm that helps vulnerable people improve their well-being through farming.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: A new house in the Hampshire countryside is needed for a young couple and their two dogs, and Sonali Shah is on hand to show them the best property the county has to offer for their £500k budget.Whilst there, Sonali visits a contemporary and stylish family home and discovers why its energy bills are virtually nonexistent.

videos.title: Derbyshire
videos.overview: Jonnie Irwin takes in the delights of Derbyshire with a couple from Leeds who want to see a range of rural properties with all the trimmings.Jonnie takes time out to visit a repair cafe where, over a coffee and slice of cake, environmentally minded customers can take household items to be mended instead of thrown away.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: A first-time buyer has decided to leave the home where she grew up in the outskirts of Birmingham for a new one in the nearby Shropshire countryside.Nicki Chapman shows her what the stunning county has to offer and helps out by pulling pints for the locals at a community-owned pub.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Three generations of the same family need help from Jules Hudson to find them a new home in rural Norfolk. In the kitty is £800,000 for a four-bedroom house, an annexe for Granny and enough land for a Shetland pony.Jules also needs a keen eye to spot some of the world's rarest - and most camera-shy - deer and antelope at a local safari park.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: huge kitchen is a big priority for Steve Brown's couple today as they take in the sights and sounds of the exceptional North Yorkshire countryside.Away from property shopping, Steve meets a group of men in a shed to learn about a scheme that helps their mental and physical health.

videos.title: West Country
videos.overview: There are two counties for the price of one today as Nicki Chapman visits Somerset and Dorset with a buyer from London who is in search of a new life and a new home in the countryside for her £800k budget.Whilst in the area, Nicki also visits the town of Frome to learn how a fridge (yes, a fridge!) is helping to bring the local community together.

videos.title: Perth & Kinross
videos.overview: Jules Hudson unearths some excellent and innovative property choices in the magical landscape of Perth and Kinross for his buyer's budget of £210,000.Jules also gets to mess about in a boat on the king of Scotland's rivers, the magnificent Tay, where he learns about the efforts being made to conserve its salmon population.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: After 25 years living in America, today's couple are heading back to Blighty and have chosen Cornwall for their homecoming. Sonali Shah is on hand to show them some of the best property available in the county for their £675,000 budget.Sonali also drops in on a past Escape buyer to find out all about the highs and lows of moving to this ever-popular county.

videos.title: Pembrokeshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton shows today's buyer around Pembrokeshire.Whilst in the Welsh county, Alistair takes time out to test the therapeutic benefits of a dip in the cold sea, wearing nothing warmer than his swimming trunks.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: A globetrotting couple have decided to move back home for good, and Nicki Chapman lends a hand as they try to find a new address in Oxfordshire's lovely countryside for their £650k budget.Nicki also discovers how and why the county is leading the way with the recycling of its food waste.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: The focus is on Wiltshire today as Jonnie Irwin helps a couple from London make a life-changing move to this beautiful county.Jonnie also meets a group of bicycling enthusiasts, joining them on a ride through the fascinating Longleat Estate.

videos.title: Welsh Marches
videos.overview: There's a sense of urgency today in the Welsh Marches as Sonali Shah helps a couple who have already sold their old house to find a new one with enough land to be self-sufficient.Together they visit a community project where locals get to take home and enjoy the vegetables and fruits of their labour.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: There are grand ambitions in Norfolk as Alistair Appleton helps an opera singer and his husband find a house with space inside to hold small concerts and a garden big enough to keep a couple of pigs.During his time in the county, Alistair also meets a former fashion editor from London who uses social media to share the joys of her country life from her beautiful Georgian home.

videos.title: Lincolnshire
videos.overview: A desire to move closer to family and the need for a new single-storey home is fuelling today's buyers to make the move from Birmingham to the Lincolnshire countryside.Jules Hudson is there to help the couple navigate the property market in the county, where he also finds out what a difference nearly 60 years has made in tractor technology.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: There are some impressive properties on offer in Devon today as Nicki Chapman helps a couple from London to figure out what they do and don't want from their new life in the country.On a break from the house search, Nicki visits a workshop where traditional sign-writing skills are being kept alive.

videos.title: Monmouthshire
