videos.overview: A young couple from London have £325,000 to spend on a new rural home, and it's Sonali Shah who's leading the search in the Monmouthshire countryside.Sonali takes her buyers to visit a market garden using a novel ‘no dig' growing method, which aims to preserve the soil with a lot less backbreaking work!

videos.title: Norfolk & Suffolk Borders
videos.overview: A move to Norfolk or Suffolk has been a long time in the making for a couple from Middlesex, and Jules Hudson is just the man to help make their dream come true for their £400k budget.Aside from property, Jules pays a visit to a new 400-acre wildlife sanctuary and is impressed to see just how quickly Mother Nature can thrive if given the opportunity.

videos.title: East Midlands
videos.overview: Three generations of one family want to move to the East Midlands, and the task of finding a new home for them all has fallen on Mum, Grandma, and Ginny Buckley.Away from houses, Ginny meets a volunteer group helping to restore the area's local canals and their footpaths so that wildlife can thrive and the public can enjoy a safer stroll.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Having fallen head over heels with North Yorkshire, a retired teacher and her pet bunny Gary need Nicki Chapman's help with finding a new home for £450k from which to fully explore this beautiful county.Sausages are on the menu too, as Nicki helps to make and then taste a vegan banger.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Having spent many happy family holidays in Cornwall, a couple from Hertfordshire now want to make England's most south-westerly county their permanent home, and Steve Brown is just the man to help them realise their dream.The trio also meet a local ceramicist and take part in an Escape to the Country pottery throwdown.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Briony May Williams is on her home turf in Somerset as she helps a couple with a budget of £500k who are looking to swap their narrow boat for a more traditional house on terra firma.Briony also visits a market garden initiative that operates alongside a hostel for the homeless and rural rough sleepers.

videos.title: North Norfolk
videos.overview: Creating a luxury holiday let business is just as important as finding a new family home for today's couple. They want to relocate to rural north Norfolk, and Jules Hudson is there to open doors for them.A familiar face also welcomes Jules aboard her fishing boat for an impromptu lesson on how to dress a crab.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: A dog-friendly garden is a top priority today for Nicki Chapman's buyer in Devon, who has £350,000 to spend on a new home for her and her much-loved pet pooch.After the house tours are over, Nicki visits a charity that gives city children an opportunity to experience the muck and magic of life on a farm.

videos.title: Perth and Kinross
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in his element today as he visits the spectacular Perth and Kinross countryside, on a mission to help a young couple from Edinburgh realise their dream of a new lifestyle in a rural home.Aside from property, a visit to the coast, to learn about one of the world's most advanced wind turbines, leaves Alistair full of hope about the future of the UK's renewable energy.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Suffolk is today's destination for Steve Brown. He is joined by a couple from London who have £575,000 to spend on a new home from where they want to kick-start a new life in the countryside.Steve also meets an inspirational pair of young farmers who, despite having full-time jobs elsewhere, find time to farm 70 acres using ethical and sustainable methods.

videos.title: West Yorkshire
videos.overview: With their current townhouse bursting at the seams, today's couple - along with their five children and two dogs - need Ginny Buckley's help to find a large rural property. In West Yorkshire, they get the local lowdown from both Ginny and her mum Maggie.Having grown up in the area, Ginny also finds out what it is to be a proud Yorkshire person.

videos.title: Cotswolds
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton shows off the Cotswolds in all its glory to a couple who want a complete change of lifestyle. Moving from Edinburgh, they have a budget of over £1 million to spend on their new dream home.Alistair also visits a farm that has adopted bygone methods to grow sustainable and environmentally friendly crops.

videos.title: The Lothians
videos.overview: Jules Hudson prepares himself for a beautiful but bracing property adventure in the lowlands of Scotland as he travels around the Lothians. He's with a buyer from Edinburgh who has a £360k budget to make a longed-for break from the city and has brought her aunt along for support.Amongst a diverse range of property options, Jules also tours a striking fortified 16th-century tower that has been meticulously restored back into a great Scottish house.

videos.title: Buckinghamshire
videos.overview: Leafy Buckinghamshire is Sonali Shah's destination today, where she's helping a London couple search for their dream countryside home.Sticking to bricks and mortar, Sonali also visits the county's last independent brick maker and finds out how to make them, but soon discovers it's not as easy as it looks.

videos.title: Wye Valley
videos.overview: The beautiful Wye Valley may not be too far from Bristol, where today's couple are from, but it's a whole world away in terms of lifestyle.Steve Brown has some tempting properties up his sleeve, and during some downtime all three manage to unwind and enjoy the scenery with a leisurely canoe ride on the River Wye itself.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Chris Bavin and today's couple marvel at Shropshire's stunning countryside in between checking out some tempting homes from the county's property market.Taking time away from the house search, Chris's taste buds are in for a treat when he meets a local chef who uses seasonal, local food, much of which he forages for himself.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Who better to show a young couple with a growing family from London around Kent than local girl Nicki Chapman?Away from the house hunt, Nicki takes a trip down memory lane, meeting up with her best friend from school, before they join Nicki's mum at the family's beach hut in Herne Bay.

videos.title: Welsh Borders
videos.overview: In the Welsh Borders, Jules Hudson is the local with the lowdown, helping a retired colonel and his wife with their property shopping requirements.Jules also meets up with a group of local ramblers to discuss the correct etiquette when walking in the great British countryside.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Wanting to move to Dorset, just one county away from their current home, today's couple are led by Sonali Shah to discover what the local housing market has to offer for their £550,000 budget.Sonali also helps to create sustainable beauty products made from locally foraged plants and herbs.

videos.title: Cambridgeshire
videos.overview: Returning home after seven years in Switzerland, today's couple are expecting a baby and have called on Margherita Taylor to help them find a family home in Cambridgeshire.Margherita also visits one of the country's largest solar farms to learn how generating renewable energy can be compatible with grazing livestock.

videos.title: The Gower
videos.overview: The sun shines all week long as Alistair Appleton helps a couple to move one step closer to their dream of a new life on the gorgeous Gower Peninsula in Wales.Apart from checking out some fabulous properties, Alistair collects cockles and tries laverbread for the first time.

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: A creative couple from London want to leave city life behind in search of new adventures in Gloucestershire, and Chris Bavin is on hand to guide them.Along with presenting a lovely selection of houses, Chris also visits a local football club to check out for himself why it's green by name and green by nature.

videos.title: Lancashire and Cumbria Borders
videos.overview: Having met just 18 months ago, today's couple are wasting no time and are selling up their homes to find a new one together, in the countryside of Cumbria or Lancashire.Briony May Williams is there to help with their property search, and whilst in the region she also visits one of the finest restaurants in the country.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Although originally from the UK, today's couple have been living in Canada since the 1980s. Now back home, and with Ginny Buckley's help, they are raring to find a new way of life and a new house in Dorset.Ginny also visits a farm helping to keep the elderly and retired gents fit in mind, body and soul.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: North Yorkshire beckons to an Essex couple who need Jonnie Irwin's help to find a home in this beautiful region.Jonnie also visits the popular seaside resort of Whitby on a mission to work out why we love fish and chips so much and to discover who makes the best in town.

videos.title: Shropshire and Herefordshire
videos.overview: A couple are leaving Spain for good and want to settle in the countryside of either Shropshire or Herefordshire.Steve Brown accepts the challenge to find them their new home, and also finds the time to visit a traditional rural estate to learn how diversification is helping to secure its future and support the local community.

videos.title: Berkshire
videos.overview: Wanting to swap their home in London for a new one in the Berkshire countryside, today's couple have a whopping £1 million budget, and Alistair Appleton is here to help them spend it.Alistair also takes time out to visit a restaurant and theatre in an old mill on the River Thames, where he meets the actor and playwright Simon Williams.

videos.title: Derbyshire
videos.overview: Having sold up his home in the large Bedfordshire town of Luton, today's buyer has already relocated to a rental in Derbyshire, but has called on the expertise of Sonali Shah to help him source his very own property in the countryside, where he can entertain family and friends.For a real flavour of local life, they sample traditional Bakewell puddings and tarts, as well as some exotic cuisine from much further afield.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Steve Brown faces a double challenge in his home county of Kent as he helps two sisters from London to buy a house each. With two separate budgets and different priorities, they are exploring options for rural and coastal living.Steve also meets a father and son whose family have been restoring traditional oast houses for four generations.

videos.title: Worcestershire
videos.overview: Chris Bavin is on hand to make the rural English dream a reality by presenting some beautiful properties to a couple returning to the UK after 20 years living abroad in Canada. They have a big budget to spend on a new home and are open to the countryside in either Worcestershire or Warwickshire.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Somerset is the destination today, where Alistair Appleton is helping an industrious young couple from Hertfordshire who are eager to make a rural move to the county.In the home of cheddar cheese, Alistair investigates innovations to complement that dairy tradition when he visits a local producer who specialises in vegan cheese.

videos.title: Bedfordshire
videos.overview: Bedfordshire beckons today's couple, who are looking for the peace and quiet the county has on offer.Steve Brown guides them on their house hunt, and he also visits Biggleswade to find out about an easily accessible off-road, multi-user path that circumnavigates the market town, enabling people to connect to the local countryside and its wildlife.

videos.title: Somerset and Dorset
videos.overview: The ladies are on tour in Somerset and Dorset today, where Briony May Williams helps a buyer from London, with her daughter in tow for support, to realise the dream of a new life in the country.Briony also visits a local kitchen to learn about the potential health benefits of fermented food whilst creating kimchi, an ancient Korean dish made using the humble cabbage.

videos.title: East Devon
videos.overview: Wanting to be close to the coast, today's rural relocators have a £650,000 budget, and it's Jonnie Irwin who's on hand to help them start a new life by finding a new home in Devon.Jonnie also visits Beer, a picturesque fishing village long associated with smugglers, where he tries not to disturb the residents of the local caves.

videos.title: Lewis & Harris
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in Hebridean heaven on Lewis and Harris, helping a couple with a £400k budget to relocate to this beautiful, rugged Scottish island.As well as exploring the island and a handful of its properties, Alistair meets a host of welcoming locals and visits a tweed mill to discover how the exclusive fabric is made.

videos.title: Herefordshire Borders
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton border-hops between Herefordshire and its neighbouring counties today as he helps a buyer from Guernsey to find her perfect party property in the countryside for a budget of £500,000.Whilst in the area, Alistair also pays a home visit to fellow Escape to the Country presenter Jules Hudson, where they reminisce about their time on the show and ponder what the future holds for the countryside housing market.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: With their current house bursting at the seams, a couple with two young sons enlist Sonali Shah to help them spend their £450,000 budget on a new home in the Somerset countryside.Away from the house-hunting, Sonali visits a project that aims to help tackle climate change by planting half a million trees over the next five years.

videos.title: Buckinghamshire
videos.overview: Three generations of the same family ask Jules Hudson to help them move from London to Buckinghamshire, a county famous for its chair-making heritage.Speaking of seats, Jules learns what it takes to make a top of the range, handmade toilet seat fit for some of the grandest houses in the world.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Cornwall, the call of the sea and Steve Brown beckon a young, water-loving couple who are looking to escape to the coastal county with their young daughter. They have £620,000 to spend on their new Cornish home.Steve also gets the chance to take to the water with a sailing school who support people of all abilities to develop their nautical know-how.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Sonali Shah helps a young couple wanting to swap town life in Halifax for country life in the wonderful surroundings of North Yorkshire.Taking a break from the properties, Sonali visits one of the largest farm shops in the UK, where she discovers from its customers and staff just what they think sets it apart from the supermarket chains.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Devon is today's destination, where Nicki Chapman helps a couple from south London with a £500,000 budget to search for their dream home in the countryside.Wanting to help out in the community, Nicki takes them to Appledore to meet the brave men and women who volunteer at the village's RNLI station.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Two sisters want to combine their resources in Somerset to find a secluded house that has enough land to start their own music festival, though on a slightly smaller scale than the one the county is famous for.Alistair Appleton escorts them on their search and has time to visit the village of Stoke St Gregory, where an old pub has been transformed into not just the local watering hole but a community shop and café too.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Having spent 30 years living and working in Hong Kong, today's escapee teams up with Jonnie Irwin in North Yorkshire with a house-hunting budget of £350,000.Away from the property shopping, Jonnie heads to the Yorkshire Dales to discover what is being done to restore and preserve one of the most environmentally important landscapes in Europe.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Wanting to be close to the coast, a couple from Birmingham have decided that Cornwall is the perfect destination for their escape, and Sonali Shah is on hand to make their dream come true. And when is a brick not just a brick?Sonali finds out by visiting a company creating habitats for solitary bees. Their method can also be used in the construction of homes for humans.

videos.title: Anglesey
videos.overview: Feeling an affinity for Wales and in particular the island of Anglesey, a Canadian couple ask Briony May Williams to find them the stone cottage they've always dreamed of owning for their budget of £450,000.Briony also visits the island's sea zoo to learn about their work conserving endangered marine life, including the sedentary seahorse.

videos.title: Powys
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in the Welsh county of Powys with a couple whose property wish list includes an annexe for their parents, along with at least half an acre of land for their budget of £650,000.Jules also meets a man who scours space with his telescopes, looking for large, undiscovered objects that could be on a collision course with Earth. Fortunately, he hasn't found any... yet!

videos.title: Guernsey
videos.overview: It's a first for Nicki Chapman and the Escape to the Country team today as they head to glorious Guernsey in the Channel Islands. They're there tohelp find a fabulous family home for a young couple and their three children.Nicki also meets some of the island's most famous four-legged inhabitants, a herd of Guernsey cows.

videos.title: Ayrshire
videos.overview: In Ayrshire, Jonnie Irwin helps a retired couple who want to reconnect with their Scottish roots. They have a budget of £500,000 and a view over water is a property priority.Whilst in the region, Jonnie also learns about an ancient technique used to produce salt using sea water and an impressive tower of blackthorn branches.

videos.title: West Yorkshire
videos.overview: In West Yorkshire, Steve Brown supports an artist who is looking to leave London to realise her ambition of living life in the countryside.Steve also visits the town of Todmorden and discovers a remarkable community project encouraging the planting and growing of food in public spaces for anyone to harvest and enjoy.

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: A soon-to-be retired vicar and her husband need Sonali Shah's help to find a new home in the beautiful countryside of Gloucestershire.Sonali also visits Adam Henson, who, as well as being the nation's favourite farmer, is also the custodian of his father's legacy - a farm dedicated to the conservation of some of the rarest livestock breeds in the world.

videos.title: Derbyshire
videos.overview: Looking to leave London for Derbyshire, a couple with four children need some expert guidance from Denise Nurse, as she helps them navigate the county's rural housing market in search of the perfect family home.Denise also catches up with a past escapee who now runs a mobile refill shop which helps to reduce plastic waste.

videos.title: Anglesey
videos.overview: It's an island escape today, as Jules Hudson helps a couple from a town in Cheshire to find their dream home on Anglesey. During the busy week of house-hunting,Jules turns his attention away from property and heads to the Welsh mainland to catch up with a passionate farmer, Gareth Wyn Jones, whose family has been working the land for 375 years.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: After 23 years living in Canada, today's buyer is returning to the UK for good. With a budget of £400,000, she is looking to make her rural escape to Devon, but there's a catch - she has never been to the county before. She need not worry because Nicki Chapman has, many times before.Away from the house search, Nicki discovers how to be a friend indeed to an exhausted bee-in-need!

videos.title: Oxfordshire and Wiltshire
videos.overview: Briony May Williams meets a couple from London who are in the market for a new home in the countryside of Oxfordshire or Wiltshire, as long as it has enough space for them and their two young sons.Taking time away from house-hunting, Briony learns why the relatively new practice of not mowing the grass in the month of May is here to stay.

videos.title: Argyll and Bute
videos.overview: An adventurous young couple from Nottinghamshire are looking to move county and country to Argyll and Bute, where Sonali Shah has some splendid Scottish properties waiting to show them.In an action-packed few days, Sonali also takes to the water on a paddleboard and to the air in a seaplane, delighting at the spectacular views on offer from above.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is in the coastal county of Cornwall today, helping a couple to turn their favourite holiday destination into their permanent home on a budget of £475,000.Away from the search, Denise visits a new development that's tackling the county's housing crisis by prioritising the needs of local Cornish people.

videos.title: West Sussex
videos.overview: Today, we have a marvellous multi-generational move to consider as Alistair Appleton guides one family, spread over four generations, to find two houses in one village. It's a tall order, but Alistair presents a whole host of interesting property options, including the mystery house that promises to bring them closer together than they ever imagined.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman teams up with an author from west London who wants to pen an exciting new chapter for herself in the beautiful Oxfordshire countryside.Away from the property hunt, Nicki visits a small village in the county to find out why it was recently named ‘the kindest village in Britain'.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Steve Brown is on hand to help a couple of newlyweds who are looking to escape south London and set down roots in the stunning countryside of Cumbria. They have already discounted a dozen properties, so the pressure is on Steve to deliver somewhere that can become their very first home together.

videos.title: Cambridgeshire
videos.overview: A keen singer from south east London, accompanied by her good friend, needs help to find a new home in Cambridgeshire with her budget of £360,000. Sonali Shah is only too happy to offer some guidance, and together they explore a range of interesting property possibilities, potential new communities and plenty of countryside.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: A couple from urban Hertfordshire with a £550,000 budget have their sights set on moving to the Somerset countryside, and Jules Hudson has some splendid properties lined up to tempt them. However, Jules has a big surprise up his sleeve as he questions not the type of new home they're looking for, but the location of it.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: The pressure is on Nicki Chapman to find today's couple their perfect property in wonderful Wiltshire, as they have already sold their London home.Away from house hunting, and being no stranger to the airwaves herself, Nicki pays a visit to one of the county's local radio stations to find out how it helps to keep the community connected.

videos.title: Argyll and Bute
videos.overview: It's destination Argyll and Bute today. Sonali Shah tours this region of Scotland in search of a new home for a couple from a Warwickshire town who have a budget of £340,000. Sonali almost takes to the water on Loch Lomond, as she lends a hand to help a group of volunteers restoring the last paddle steamer to be built in Britain, a treasured relic of Scottish history.

videos.title: Powys
videos.overview: Space for holiday lets or glamping is the priority for a couple today who are chasing a complete change of lifestyle in Wales. Steve Brown kick-starts their Powys property journey with a great selection of countryside homes with business potential.He also takes time to visit a local reservoir that was built by the Victorians but looks every inch part of the natural landscape.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: In true Escape to the Country style, today's couple (both former international rugby players) want to leave London in search of a rural idyll in Dorset, and Alistair Appleton is the man to help them on their way.Aside from property, Alistair learns about the health benefits of watercress at a farm that specialises in growing this delicious and nutritious crop.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: The devoted owners of no fewer than six Irish wolfhounds are in desperate need of more space for them and those countless muddy paws, so have set their sights on Suffolk for a bit more elbow room. Briony May Williams is there to guide them as they tour a selection of beautiful homes.Briony also gets to mess about on a stunning million-pound wooden yacht, a sister vessel to the ones featured in James Bond.

videos.title: South West Wales
videos.overview: With the help of her mother and Jules Hudson, a buyer from suburban Surrey is looking for a new family home with enough land to start a dog-training school in south west Wales. Jules investigates an alternative to machinery and man hours, as he meets a flock of goats for hire who can clear (by eating!) an overgrown patch of land in no time at all.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: With the recent arrival of grandchildren, today's globetrotting escapees are returning home for good from Malaysia and want to put down permanent roots in the Herefordshire countryside. Nicki Chapman is on hand with some great property options plus her expert advice to help plant them firmly in this lovely county.

videos.title: Isle of Wight
videos.overview: With a budget of £440,000, today's couple are looking forward to retiring from the Buckinghamshire commuter belt to a new home on the majestic Isle of Wight.Steve Brown helps them with their house hunting and also discovers why the island is an ideal location for growing dozens of varieties of tomatoes.

videos.title: Cheshire
videos.overview: Cheshire may be a world away from Miami, where today's couple are moving from, but to them, it's a county that feels like home, and Alistair Appleton is on hand to help them settle in.As an area once famed for its silk production, Alistair also takes the opportunity to visit a factory specialising in hand-printed luxury garments.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: A couple from the largest town in Dorset want to escape the urban sprawl to establish a new country life in Devon, and Sonali Shah is on hand to help them kick-start their property search.Sonali also learns the importance of the role local newspapers play in keeping their communities connected and informed.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a buyer with a budget of £450,000 who wants to escape her ex-council flat in south London and create a new life in the Wiltshire countryside. She's after somewhere with a bit more space for herself and her young daughter.Taking a breather from property, Nicki also discovers why the county's chalk streams are the perfect habitat for trout when she pays a visit to a sustainable fish farm.

videos.title: Peak District
videos.overview: Steve Brown meets a pair of cycling enthusiasts on the hunt for the perfect rural idyll in the Peak District. They have a budget of £450,000 to swap city life in Essex for the wooded valleys and open moorland of the national park.Steve also takes to the water when he visits one of the country's top destinations for accessible fishing.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton meets a couple who are looking for a complete change of lifestyle in the Cumbrian countryside. Their relocation is driven by a desire to be closer to their daughter, who has already made the move there.Alistair also visits one of the region's forests and takes in some spectacular views on an exciting two-wheeled safari.

videos.title: Devon and Dorset
videos.overview: Now that her sons have fledged the nest, today's buyer wants a new lease of life in a rural home that has business potential. She's set her sights on either Devon or Dorset, where Briony May Williams has some wonderful property options to show her.Briony also meets another entrepreneurial couple who've converted an old railway carriage into a fine dining destination.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: It's an emotional journey today as Alistair Appleton helps a buyer with a £260,00 budget to escape her small flat near Heathrow airport. She is desperate for some peace and quiet, and is hoping that the Wiltshire countryside will deliver the cottage she's been dreaming of.Talk turns from property to agriculture when Alistair meets a group of young farmers to discuss their views on the future of the industry.

videos.title: Devon and Dorset
videos.overview: Today's escapees want to raise their children near the sea, so Jules Hudson takes them to view a selection of wonderful homes in the Devon and Dorset countryside.Away from the houses, Jules takes to a three-wheeled bicycle when he joins a scheme that helps people to get out and about along the area's beautiful coastline.

videos.title: Surrey
videos.overview: Steve Brown is on a property-hunting mission in Surrey today, with a buyer who has a budget of £500,000 to find the space she needs for her and her dog.Keen to help out in the community, Steve also takes her to visit a Grade One-listed cemetery, where they meet a group of volunteers who keep the graves and grounds in tip-top condition.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is house-hunting in Norfolk with a buyer who has holidayed there throughout her life and now wants to make the county her home and business address. She wants to establish holiday lets and also rehome dogs in need, so Sonali takes her to a sanctuary to find out what it takes to look after the thousands of rescue animals in their care.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in captivating Cornwall, where she has some wonderful Cornish homes lined up to tempt a buyer from suburban Surrey who is looking for a fresh start for him and his grandson.Whilst in the county, Nicki pays a visit to Newlyn Harbour and discovers how sustainability and traceability are at the forefront of the local fishing industry.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Finally able to search for their forever home and a more settled way of life, a former royal marine and a retired civil servant have £375,000 to spend and the expert guidance of Jules Hudson.Jules has a tempting selection of countryside properties to unveil for the couple, who've chosen to relocate closer to family in the wonderfully evocative county of Northumberland.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley is in Suffolk, helping a retired couple from Essex find a new home in a thriving village as close to the county's coast as their £475,000 budget will allow.Ginny also visits a farm during asparagus season, but before she gets to sample some freshly picked vegetables, she first has to learn how to harvest them.

videos.title: West Sussex
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton relishes being in his home county of West Sussex today as he shows off some of its many delights, including a selection of beautiful properties. He's with a married couple who want to follow in Alistair's footsteps by escaping London in search of a new life and home in the countryside.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Having fallen in love with Norfolk a little more with each visit, today's couple have decided to make the county their home. Denise Nurse is there to help them find their forever house.Denise also gets the opportunity to take the helm of a newly restored boat that played a part in Operation Dynamo, the 1940 evacuation of British troops from Dunkirk.

videos.title: Lancashire
videos.overview: After 16 years down under, Jules Hudson helps a couple to relocate back to Blighty. Their £450,000 budget might not stretch quite as far in Lancashire as it did in Oz, but Jules still has a great selection of properties that are reminiscent of the home they've left behind.He also manages to squeeze in a visit to a nature reserve that was created at a quarry used to build the UK's first motorway.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Having outgrown their town flat, two newly-weds with a budget of £400,000 need Ginny Buckley's help to find a new home in the Dorset countryside that has enough space to keep bicycles, golf clubs and surfboards out of sight.On the world-famous Jurassic Coast, Ginny also meets a lifelong fossil hunter whose impressive treasures are now housed in a purpose-built museum near the coast where they were discovered.

videos.title: Fife
videos.overview: A couple from Brighton have a budget of £400,000 to buy their first home together and want a complete change of scenery. They've set their sights on the beautiful countryside of Fife, where Briony May Williams is on hand to help them spend their property pounds.Briony also meets a farmer rearing a herd of buffalo, then samples some Scottish mozzarella cheese produced from their milk.

videos.title: Somerset and Devon
videos.overview: With the help of Alistair Appleton, today's couple want to escape their land-locked life in a Leicestershire town and relocate to a county with a coastline. So, they've decided to make a new life for themselves in either Somerset or Devon.Alistair also visits the village of Carhampton, where the apple harvest is in full swing in the community orchard.

videos.title: Yorkshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in his element as he explores the glorious countryside of North and West Yorkshire with a couple from a market town in West Sussex. Jules has a superb selection of properties to show them, and key to their wish list is a big workshop where it's hoped a woodworking hobby will become a profession.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: The magnificent colours of autumn are on full display in Somerset as Jonnie Irwin helps a retired couple from Reading find their perfect property.Whilst in the county, Jonnie also visits a centuries-old cider farm and enjoys sampling a few of their fruity tipples.

videos.title: Moray
videos.overview: A couple hope their £400,000 budget will buy them a slice of rural bliss in Moray in Scotland, where Jules Hudson is eager to show them the very best property on offer.Jules also chats to some of the residents of an award-winning village recognised as a world leader for sustainable and holistic community living.

videos.title: Pembrokeshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is on the hunt for a Pembrokeshire property with a holiday let to suit a couple with very different wants and needs.Nicki also visits some entrepreneurs who've already made the move to the county and have completely changed their lifestyles by turning a derelict farmhouse into a gorgeous home where they welcome B&B guests.

videos.title: Northumbria
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple are so fed up with the eight-hour round trip to see their son in Northumbria that they've decided to move there instead.Denise has the keys to some lovely properties and also pays a visit to the Northumberland National Park to learn how it has come to be known as ‘the land of the far horizon'.

videos.title: Somerset and Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Having spent 25 years in Holland, a retired opera singer and a music teacher approaching retirement have decided that now is the right time to return to the UK and, with Alistair Appleton's help, find a new home in Somerset or Gloucestershire.Whilst in the area, Alistair drops by a family farm that transforms its fields of golden rape into bottles of rapeseed oil.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Briony May Williams helps to make dreams come true for a buyer with an ambition of moving to the North Yorkshire countryside on a £250,000 budget.Then, she takes her escapee to a farm, where they are given the special privilege of hand-feeding a five-day-old pet lamb.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is in Norfolk, with a buyer who wants to move closer to her family, and who has her son in tow for support.With the popularity of the staycation, Denise also meets someone who has taken the idea of mobile homes on wheels to a whole new level.

videos.title: East Midlands
videos.overview: Sonali Shah tours the East Midlands in search of a property to suit today's buyers who, for the last 23 years, have been living in the USA.Sonali also meets another couple who relocated from America and set about renovating their gorgeous Leicestershire home, parts of which date back to the 18th century.

videos.title: Caithness
videos.overview: Jules Hudson savours the spectacular scenery and splendid isolation on offer in Scotland's Caithness, as he helps a young family with a house-hunting budget of £270,000 to realise their dream of self-sufficiency.Whilst there, Jules learns about the life of a crofter with a tenant farmer whose ancestors have lived and worked on the same land for generations.

videos.title: Yorkshire
videos.overview: Seeking a less hectic lifestyle in Yorkshire, a London couple have £425,000 to spend on a new home, and Steve Brown is on hand to help them find it.Steve also pays a visit to the North York Moors National Park to find out about the work being done to ensure the park is accessible to everyone.

videos.title: South West Wales
videos.overview: Having lived in the same house virtually all her life, today's ukelele-playing buyer has £280,000 to relocate to south west Wales. Briony May Williams is tasked with helping her to find the perfect property which also needs to accommodate an entourage of animals including a dog, two cats, three parrots, some chickens and thousands of bees.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: A pair of artists need Alistair Appleton's help to find an inspiring rural retreat in Somerset where they can further indulge their creativity.Alistair also meets a young couple who moved to the countryside in search of the good life and never looked back, despite ups and downs along the way.

videos.title: The Lothians
videos.overview: After 26 years in London, today's couple has headed north to the Scottish Lothians in search of a complete change of lifestyle. They have a house-hunting budget of £475,000 and Nicki Chapman to help them spend it.We also get insight on life in the beautiful, rural Highlands from another couple who escaped their stressful and high-pressure jobs just over a year ago.

videos.title: The Wye Valley
videos.overview: Jules Hudson explores one of the UK's most beautiful locations today as he sets about finding the ideal Wye Valley property for his house hunters. Having put their Portugal home on the market, they've recently been touring the UK in their beloved camper van named Dave and are itching to settle down somewhere with more space inside and out!

videos.title: Lincolnshire
videos.overview: Having taken a leap of faith, today's couple from Scotland stuck a pin in a map that landed in lovely Lincolnshire. Sonali Shah tours the county with them, showing them the very best property the county has to offer for their £220,000 budget.Whilst there, Sonali also learns how best to keep one of the nation's favourite flowers in blooming marvellous condition.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Now back in the UK, a young couple crave the outdoors lifestyle they experienced together for nearly three years in New Zealand. Nicki Chapman's helps them find a new home in the fabulous countryside of North Yorkshire, where they want to spend their spare time running, cycling and walking.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Needing more space for books, as well as an impressive collection of rocks, today's couple from Edinburgh have Alistair Appleton to help them with their rural relocation to Northumberland.Alistair also meets another couple who, back in 2016, made their own escape to the country from Newcastle and now run yoga and well-being classes.

videos.title: Perth and Kinross
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is in Perth and Kinross, helping a young couple with a budget of £350,000 to find an ideal country home for them and their two young sons.Jules also meets a group of keen stand-up paddleboarders who do their bit to keep the waterways free of litter.

videos.title: West Yorkshire
videos.overview: In wonderful West Yorkshire, Nicki Chapman is with a young couple from Manchester who have a budget of £270,000 to find a home in the countryside for them and their baby son.Nicki also meets a pair who've already made their escape when they took early retirement and swapped town life for country life on the edge of the beautiful Yorkshire Dales.

videos.title: Hampshire
videos.overview: In Hampshire, Steve Brown has some excellent houses in his property shopping bag to show today's couple who, along with their two children and two tortoises, want to live as close as possible to the county's beautiful beaches.Steve also finds out what we can all do to help our feathered friends, whether we have a garden or not.

videos.title: Northamptonshire
videos.overview: Wanting to leave town life behind them, this episode's couple have their sights set on a new countryside home in Northamptonshire, and Ginny Buckley is on hand to help them find it.Ginny also discovers a beautiful green space on the outskirts of Kettering, where the town's residents can recharge their minds, bodies and green fingers.

videos.title: Warwickshire
videos.overview: Missing family and the great British countryside, today's couple are heading home to Warwickshire having spent the last six years living and working in the USA. Jules Hudson helps with their house search and visits an 18th century walled garden to meet the volunteers who help keep it in tip-top condition.

videos.title: Perth and Kinross
videos.overview: Sonali Shah marvels at the majesty of Perth and Kinross, as she helps a couple from a large town on England's south coast to find their dream country escape in Scotland. With their house-hunting budget of £425,000, lots of bookshelves, or places for them, are a top priority.

videos.title: The Peak District
videos.overview: Denise Nurse delivers the Peak District on a plate as she helps a couple from a town in Oxfordshire to find their dream country home for a budget of £450,000.Whilst in the area, Denise also visits a family-run hotel and restaurant, where she gets to sample some locally grown, seasonal delights.

videos.title: Norfolk
videos.overview: On a bid to escape the city, today's couple and their three children are looking for a change of lifestyle for the whole family, and Nicki Chapman is in Norfolk to help them find it. Nicki also meets some of the residents of Hemsby, whose homes are at risk from coastal erosion, to learn how the whole village is pulling together to help save them.

videos.title: Welsh Borders
videos.overview: A couple from Reading in Berkshire want to escape and set up home in the Welsh Borders, somewhere with enough land to keep a menagerie of animals. Steve Brown helps them with the property search and takes them to an animal sanctuary to meet Burrito, a cuddle-loving donkey, as well as two pampered pigs, Wilbur and Uncle Watson.

videos.title: Bedfordshire Borders
videos.overview: Even though the daily commute from London to their Bedfordshire business is taking its toll, Nicki Chapman has her work cut out persuading one half of today's couple to move to the county's borders!Away from the house-hunting, Nicki visits a farm that opens its gates to disabled people looking for a life in agriculture.

videos.title: Scottish Borders
videos.overview: Denise Nurse shows off the magnificent Scottish Borders in all their glory to a young couple looking to make a big countryside escape. One half wants to open a veterinary practice in the region, and the other needs outbuildings for cars and motorbikes, but they are both united by their love of the great outdoors.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: On the lookout for a property with potential for a holiday let business, as well as a home, Jules Hudson shows off a gloriously sunny Cornwall to today's entrepreneurial couple. Jules also tours a disused china clay quarry, where work has begun to create a sustainable and inclusive garden village by building over 1,000 energy-efficient homes.

videos.title: Buckinghamshire Borders
videos.overview: Helping a young couple from the city of St Albans, Briony May Williams heads to Buckinghamshire to find a fabulous countryside escape for them and Dexter the dog.Aside from all the house hunting, Briony pays a visit to one of the county's many National Trust properties, where she finds out what it takes to be a tour guide.

videos.title: Oxfordshire
videos.overview: In a bid to move closer to family, today's buyer has Nicki Chapman to help find a home in the Oxfordshire countryside for her and her son.Whilst in the area, Nicki pops in on friends who recently moved to the county, relocating their business training dressage horses and renovating a house in the process.

videos.title: Cairngorms
videos.overview: Jules Hudson takes in Scotland's stunning Cairngorms as he helps a couple from the Isle of Wight to find a rural property that will fulfill their ambitions for home as well as a new business.He also drops in on a family who moved to the region to start a fly-fishing school and becomes their star pupil for the day.

videos.title: Welsh Borders
videos.overview: With a budget of £400,000, an ambitious young couple from the West Midlands has the help of Sonali Shah to find a renovation project and a couple of acres of land in the Welsh Borders.Sonali also heads to Hay-on-Wye to meet a couple who escaped London in 2022 and are in the process of transforming a Grade II listed building into their new home.

videos.title: The Fens
videos.overview: Steve Brown's escapees from a large Buckinghamshire town want to relocate to the fabulous Fens to start a glamping business, so at least an acre of land is a priority.Steve meets another couple who are about to start building the house of their dreams by recycling as many materials as they can from a derelict 250-year-old farmer's cottage and barn.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Wanting to move closer to family, Nicki Chapman celebrates the arrival of her buyers' first grandchild by helping them find a new home in Cumbria.Nicki also meets a young, nature-loving couple who made their own escape from Sheffield a year ago, and who are now raising their daughter in the area's amazing natural landscapes.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Leaving the house they built themselves behind, today's couple has Jules Hudson to help them find the perfect West Country pad in Devon, where they want to start a holiday let business.Away from the property search, Jules heads to the county's north coast to find out why it's been designated as the UK's first and only World Surfing Reserve.

videos.title: Carmarthenshire
videos.overview: Ginny Buckley's buyer today is chasing an inspiring landscape. She wants a new Carmarthenshire home that has as much land as her £450,000 budget can muster.She's also keen to make some green-fingered, like-minded friends in the area, so a trip to meet some volunteers at the National Garden of Wales is also on the agenda.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Today's escapees want to move to Shropshire to be closer to their family and have entrusted Alistair Appleton to help them find a lovely rural retreat for both them and their bees.Alistair also takes advantage of the glorious weather and nearly bares all as he partakes in one of his passions with a spot of wild swimming.

videos.title: East Sussex
videos.overview: Returning home after eight years of living and working in Abu Dhabi, two teachers want to swap desert sand for the beaches of East Sussex, where Briony May Williams has the keys to what could be the couple's new home.Keen to get involved in the local community, they visit the Bluebell Railway to see what volunteering opportunities there are on the heritage line.

videos.title: Aberdeenshire
videos.overview: With a budget of £400,000, Jules Hudson is on hand to make a Sydney couple's dream of an escape to Aberdeenshire come true.Away from the property shopping, Jules makes friends with some of the region's hairy, horny residents... a herd of Highland cattle.

videos.title: Buckinghamshire and Oxfordshire
videos.overview: Having spent the past four years living in the US state of Texas, a couple and their two young children are returning to the UK and have tasked Sonali Shah with helping them find a family home in an Oxfordshire or Buckinghamshire village.Sonali also learns how to make sourdough bread from an ex-solicitor who escaped London several years ago.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: A couple want to swap their Cheshire townhouse for the dark skies and beautiful open spaces of Shropshire. Denise Nurse helps them with the property search and also visits a flower farm in full bloom to witness first hand how modern technology is working hand-in-hand with nature.

videos.title: The Chilterns
videos.overview: Living with their baby boy in a one-bedroom flat in south London, today's couple need more space, which they want to find in the lovely Chiltern Hills.Alistair Appleton has some fabulous houses up his sleeve, and he also takes his house hunters off to soak up the atmosphere of the Bucks County Show.

videos.title: South West Wales
videos.overview: Looking for a new adventure in South West Wales, a couple have £400,000 to find a new home with at least an acre of land for glamping and a forestry school.Ginny Buckley helps with the house hunting and meets another couple who, ten years ago, made a life-changing escape when they bought a farm in Carmarthenshire to rear rare breeds.

videos.title: Berkshire and Hampshire
videos.overview: Motivated by wanting to move closer to family, an escapee has her sister on hand for moral support and Sonali Shah's property know-how to help find the ideal rural retreat.Sonali also gets to meet some very sleepy baby barn owls and learns what needs to be done to protect these beautiful birds.

videos.title: County Antrim and County Down
videos.overview: It's an emotional homecoming, and a first for Jules Hudson, as he visits County Down and County Antrim for some property shopping in Northern Ireland. He's with a couple who want to relocate there after a lifetime spent in the Canadian city of Toronto.Jules also visits the region's coast to marvel at the spectacular, world-famous Giant's Causeway.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Briony May Williams teams up with a retired Shakespeare scholar, who with a £300,000 budget hopes to write a new chapter in her life in the Cumbrian countryside.Away from the house hunting, Briony visits a young couple who made their own country escape and now have a farm with over 100 acres in a tiny Cumbrian village, where they herd sheep with their beloved sheepdogs.

videos.title: The Cotswolds
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is on a property-hunting mission to the beautiful Cotswolds, with a couple who want a location with dog walks on the doorstep, as well as decent dining options for date nights!Away from potential houses, Alistair visits another young couple who turned their backs on town life to rent on the rural edges of the Cotswolds Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty, where they can indulge their passions for photography and gardening.

videos.title: East Midlands
videos.overview: A young couple want to swap their London flat for something bigger in the East Midlands, where Nicki Chapman opens the front doors to a lovely selection of homes with lovely gardens.Nicki can't miss the opportunity to meet another young couple who've already made their escape to develop a luxury leather goods business. After all, Nicki does love a good bag!

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Denise Nurse is in Suffolk, helping a couple find a new home in a more rural setting, where they can enjoy retired life together, closer to the coast, lakes or waterways.Also on the shopping list is a large, sociable kitchen, at least three bedrooms for hosting guests and a welcoming community close to hand.

videos.title: The Lake District
videos.overview: Having been to the Lake District over 50 times, today's couple have decided to stop visiting and start living in one of the UK's most spectacular National Parks.The about-to-be-retired couple need Steve Brown's help to find them, and their two rescue cats, a new forever home in the Cumbrian countryside.

videos.title: Bedfordshire Borders
videos.overview: A house with as much natural light as possible is top of today's property shopping list, and Jules Hudson is just the chap to find it in the region of the Bedfordshire borders.As well as touring a great selection of potential homes, they also make time to visit a magnificent garden and a collection of vintage aircraft.

videos.title: Aberdeenshire
videos.overview: Although Nicki Chapman's buyers are currently renting in a Surrey town, they've spent the last 25 years living and working in America. They now want to find their new, forever home in the Aberdeenshire countryside.Nicki also visits a local farm which grows over 20 varieties of crops, selling many of them in a large, state-of-the-art vending machine.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Living a few miles from Belfast is just too far from family, so now they've retired, today's couple want to move back to England, to Herefordshire, where Briony May Williams shows them what the beautiful county has to offer.Briony also meets another couple who have already made their escape to the area, to an old mill house and garden, which they open to the public.

videos.title: Cheshire
videos.overview: A young couple currently living in Manchester are hoping to up sticks to the Cheshire countryside with their young daughter. They have requested a four bedroom, detached family home with a large, private garden, and Nicki Chapman has a very tempting selection of properties that suit the brief, as well as a mystery house that makes them reconsider their wish list.

videos.title: The Isle of Skye
videos.overview: It's an island escape in Scotland's Inner Hebrides today, where Denise Nurse is tasked with finding a permanent home for a family who've spent the last year travelling around in their camper van, but who now want to settle on the Isle of Skye.As well as exploring a handful of its properties, Denise also meets a couple already living the Hebridean dream with their elopement wedding business.

videos.title: The Highlands
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in the Highlands of Scotland with an artistic couple whose aspirations include starting their own music festival among the magnificent mountains the region is famous for.Alistair also visits an ambitious rewilding project which hopes to restore the once vast Caledonian Forest.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: A couple from Kent want to head west to Cornwall to house-hunt for a property where they can create a wellness retreat, and Jules Hudson is just the man to help them find it. Taking a break from the search, Jules hopes to catch a glimpse of a recently released family of beavers.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Looking for inspiration in the magnificent North Yorkshire countryside, today's buyer from a town in Buckinghamshire is full of admiration for the county and the lineup of potential new homes Nicki Chapman has to show her.Whilst there, Nicki also drops in on a painter who has almost single-handedly renovated a beautiful old farmhouse into a remarkable rural retreat for other like-minded artists.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Two Eurovision enthusiasts need Denise Nurse's help to find them, and their cat Larry, a new home in the Cumbrian countryside.Away from the house hunting, Denise meets up with a young family of keen climbers and outdoor adventurers who made their own escape to this beautiful county.

videos.title: North Buckinghamshire
videos.overview: The bluebells are out in Buckinghamshire as Briony May Williams shows some splendid countryside properties to a couple wanting to escape from the Warwickshire town of Rugby.And if you've ever wondered what it would be like to swap city life for farm life then Briony meets a woman who has done just that.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Sonali Shah helps a young couple who are looking forward to buying their first house together in the picturesque countryside of Devon.Sonali also takes to the water as she learns about a project that brings awareness of what lies beneath the surface of the sea along the county's stunning coastline.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Wanting to move closer to her family and the sea, a buyer from London needs Alistair Appleton's help to find a new home in the Suffolk countryside.Alistair also meets a couple who, after they moved to the county, set about creating a beautiful wildflower meadow as a biodiversity hotspot that supports a wide range of flora and fauna.

videos.title: North Wales
videos.overview: Hoping to escape to the dramatic countryside of north Wales, Jules Hudson's buyers want to find a new home with at least an acre of land where they can create a yoga and wellbeing retreat.It's lucky Jules has a good head for heights... as he'll need it for a visit to the Menai Suspension Bridge, which is being renovated in time for the 200th anniversary of its opening.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman's buyers are already renting in the beautiful countryside of Herefordshire, but they need Nicki's help to find them a house of their own that comes with enough land for a holiday let.Watch out for a surprise visit from another of the show's presenters, who also famously lives in the county.

videos.title: Hampshire and Dorset Borders
videos.overview: Today's buyers don't mind if they find a new home in either Hampshire or Dorset, just as long as it's as close as possible to their happy place, the sea.Denise Nurse is there to put a smile on their faces, and she also meets a Hampshire family who are living the Escape to the Country dream in an idyllic Georgian gatehouse.

videos.title: Perth and Kinross Borders
videos.overview: Steve Brown marvels at the spectacular scenery on offer in Scotland's Perth and Kinross and beyond as he helps a couple with three children from a city in Essex find their dream home in the countryside. They need a big garden, good transport links and want to be within half an hour of a rugby club.

videos.title: Norfolk and Suffolk Borders
videos.overview: Having almost made their escape seven years ago, today's couple want to try again, tasking Ginny Buckley to help them move from a Surrey town and out into the countryside around the Norfolk/Suffolk border.Ginny also meets someone who has already moved to the region, turning her thatched cottage into a dreamy, picture postcard home.

videos.title: Gloucestershire
videos.overview: Returning to the UK, after 22 years in eastern Australia, today's couple have decided they now want to make their home in the countryside of glorious Gloucestershire.Nicki Chapman has the keys to some lovely characterful properties and also meets a couple who, quite literally, bought their dream house.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: A newly engaged couple from Cheshire want to buy their first home together in rural Northumberland, where Jules Hudson is on hand to show them a selection of houses that matches their wish list.A secluded location along with enough land to have a holiday let are their top priorities.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a buyer from Maidstone in Kent realise her dream of moving to the Dorset countryside, where she wants a home closer to her family so she can reconnect with loved ones. Away from the property shopping, Alistair also meets a young couple who made their own escape to the county three years ago.

videos.title: The Lothians
videos.overview: Wanting to escape south London, a mother and son meet up with Sonali Shah in the Lothians, where they want to find their ideal rural retreat, complete with an art studio.Sonali also discovers the legacy of a 19th-century, Scottish-born conservationist, known in America as the Father of the National Parks.

videos.title: West Yorkshire
videos.overview: Emotions are running high in the West Yorkshire countryside as Nicki Chapman helps a buyer from a Hertfordshire town find a new home in the beautiful county where she grew up.Whilst in the area, Nicki also meets a couple who made their escape from London three years ago and relocated to a gorgeous old farmhouse complete with six acres.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Three dogs and their two owners want to make their dream countryside escape from the busy port city of Southampton to beautiful, rural Herefordshire, where Denise Nurse is ready and waiting with the front door keys to a selection of new homes with exceptional potential.

videos.title: The Valleys
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton helps a couple from the South Yorkshire city of Doncaster find a new home in the wonderful Welsh valleys.He'll need a good head for heights when he meets up with the volunteers from the local mountain rescue team.

videos.title: East Devon Borders
videos.overview: With their children fledged, today's couple has decided to move from the busy city of Nottingham to the peace and quiet of the East Devon borders, where Jules Hudson is on hand to help them with a spot of property shopping.Jules also pays a visit to Lyme Regis, where he discovers why and how the town is determined to turn green.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Today's couple are newly retired, newly engaged, and with the help of Briony May Williams, are now looking for a new home surrounded by North Yorkshire's spectacular countryside.Whilst there, Briony also meets someone who has already made her escape and has turned a 20-acre field into a home for herself and her 48 alpacas.

videos.title: Staffordshire and Derbyshire
videos.overview: With a new job about to start in Derby, today's buyers are in urgent need of Alistair Appleton's help to find them a rural property in the Derbyshire or Staffordshire countryside. Whilst in the area, which is home to the Peak District National Park, Alistair turns his attention from property to scenery when he meets up with a group of keen countryside walkers.

videos.title: Berkshire
videos.overview: Although they don't want to move any great distance, the beautiful Berkshire countryside will be a far cry from busy Slough, where today's young couple is moving from. With a baby on the way, they want more space than their current flat provides, and Ginny Buckley is on hand to help them find the right house for their growing family. She also discovers what some of the residents in the region are doing to combat the increasing issue of river pollution.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is in the magnificent countryside of Northumberland, helping three generations of the same family to make an escape from Leicester and find a new rural home together.While she's there, Sonali also meets up with an artist who takes her inspiration from the four-legged residents of the farm she escaped to.

videos.title: Argyll and Bute
videos.overview: There's no place quite like Argyll and Bute, or so says Denise Nurse's buyer, who wants to return there from Kent.Taking a break from the house hunting, Denise hops on a ferry to the Isle of Bute to meet an artist who takes his inspiration from the landscape and the wildlife that lives there.

videos.title: The Cairngorms
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman is in the magnificent Cairngorms, property shopping with a couple who, after exploring the UK in their camper van for the last two years, have decided that the Scottish countryside is where they want to settle.Nicki also visits a company making sustainable, timber frame houses from locally sourced materials, before meeting the proud owners who live in one of them.

videos.title: West Sussex
videos.overview: After 15 years living and working in Dubai, two expats want to return home to the UK and need Sonali Shah's help to find them a new home in wonderful West Sussex. Sonali also drops in on a farm which specialises in growing a variety of sunflowers, many of which are taller than she is!

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Lost for words at the amazing property shown to them in Jules Hudson's beloved Herefordshire, today's couple need enough space for them, their dog and Dotty the caravan. Jules also discovers what it takes to create flower-rich meadows, vital habitats for wildlife and nature recovery.

videos.title: Hampshire and Wiltshire
videos.overview: Wanting to move to a quieter location than where they currently live, today's couple have tasked Denise Nurse to find them a new rural retreat in the Hampshire or Wiltshire countryside.Away from the house tours, Denise meets an endurance runner who swapped the pavements of London for the woodland trails of Hampshire.

videos.title: East Devon
videos.overview: In between marveling at the majestic countryside on offer in east Devon, Nicki Chapman goes house hunting with a couple of Londoners who are itching to move to this beautiful region.Nicki also meets a pair of former city slickers who have gone back to traditional and sustainable farming methods on their 100-acre property.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: In his home county of Kent, Steve Brown helps two newlyweds from London find a new spacious and dog-friendly family home in the countryside.Steve also meets another couple who, eight years ago, swapped their city flat for a beautiful cottage in the county, where they also established a business.

videos.title: The Jurassic Coast
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is hoping his selection of seaside properties passes the test as he helps a retired schoolteacher find a new home on Devon and Dorset's Jurassic Coast for her £300,000 budget.After a run-in with a rogue seagull intent on stealing his ice cream, Alistair relaxes by taking part in a spot of beachfront yoga.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson helps a rock-climbing couple from an East Midlands town look for a new, rural home that gives them access to the hills and dales of North Yorkshire.Whilst in the county, Jules attends the Great Yorkshire Show, an event which celebrates the region's food, countryside and agriculture.

videos.title: Somerset and Devon
videos.overview: A London-based couple want to escape from the city to carve out a new life in either Somerset or Devon, where Briony May Williams has the keys to some wonderful countryside properties.Briony also meets up with some former Londoners who converted an old cowshed into an exceptional, self-sufficient, family home with spectacular views across the Axe Valley.

videos.title: The Wye Valley
videos.overview: In the wonderful Wye Valley, Sonali Shah goes house-hunting with a couple from the Australian state of Tasmania, who are looking to buy their first home together.Sonali also drops in for a chat with TV presenter Kate Humble and tours her Wye Valley farm.

videos.title: Surrey
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps newlyweds who want to escape London and find a more serene lifestyle in the splendid Surrey countryside. The couple are desperate for a garden so they can fulfil their dream of finally getting a dog... or two.Denise also visits a community farm project where local people can come together to support one another, promoting mental wellbeing and biodiversity.

videos.title: Leicestershire
videos.overview: Jules Hudson is property-shopping in the Leicestershire countryside with a young couple who are hoping to buy their very first home together.Whilst in the county, Jules also meets a former beautician who traded in her career to work full-time on the family farm.

videos.title: South Wales
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is in south Wales, helping an outdoor enthusiast and her three pint-sized chihuahuas sniff out a home in the countryside. With a budget of £180,000, they're after the perfect base in which to sail, cycle and paddleboard.Along the way, Sonali meets a couple who've left the rat race and now combine their passions for art and animals to run a rural business.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton heads to Devon, with a mother-and-daughter duo hopeful of finding a new countryside home for the whole family in or near Dartmoor National Park. Business potential is at the top of the wish list, as there are ambitions to create a retreat centring on their love of horses and yoga.

videos.title: The Wye Valley
videos.overview: Family comes first as Ginny Buckley explores the Wye Valley with a couple whose move is fuelled by a desire to be closer to their grandchildren.Along the way, Ginny visits a family-run, fermented-foods business where she makes her very own kimchi.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: We visit the wonderful county of Suffolk, where a teacher is looking for somewhere to finally settle down after three decades travelling the world. She has a budget of £350,000, her daughter by her side for support and Denise Nurse standing by with a selection of tempting property options.Denise also meets a couple who have made a sizzling success of their Suffolk move with a thriving barbecue business.

videos.title: The Chilterns
videos.overview: The sun is shining for Nicki Chapman as she helps a young couple leave behind the hustle and bustle of London for the peaceful charm of the Chiltern Hills. They're on the hunt for a home with storage space for hobbies, as well as room for visiting family and friends.Nicki also meets a local artist who finds inspiration in the tranquil countryside whilst juggling full-time motherhood.

videos.title: Wiltshire
videos.overview: A buyer looks to swap her London home of almost 50 years for the wonderful Wiltshire countryside. A move of this magnitude can be quite a daunting prospect, so to help allay any concerns. Jules Hudson enlists the help of a former escapee, who recently made her much-longed-for move to Wiltshire.Whilst in the county, Jules also meets a British Paralympian, who's turned to making juices from the fruit grown in their garden.

videos.title: Somerset
videos.overview: Sonali Shah is house hunting with a couple from New York who want to swap the Big Apple for a bite of the sunny Somerset countryside. Working with a very healthy budget, Sonali serves up a range of spectacular properties across the ages, including a striking Somerset long house and a converted water mill that cause jaws to hit the floor and leaves today's buyers twirling with excitement.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: There's no time like the present for Alistair Appleton's buyers, who hope to realise a lifelong dream of living by the sea in Dorset. Together, they tour a variety of promising property options, and the couple introduce Alistair to their favourite seaside cafe.Away from the house search, Alistair also meets a couple who have diversified their family farm and now run a successful hospitality business with luxury shepherd's huts.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: With the last of their children about to fly the nest, a couple from a large Berkshire town need Jules Hudson's help to find them a new home in the Suffolk countryside that has holiday let potential. Jules presents a range of fantastic options for their impressive budget, all with exciting potential for paying guests, leaving the couple to figure whether it will be the business or the home that takes precedence.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Today's Escape to the Country sees Nicki Chapman property shopping in Devon, with a pair of entrepreneurial sisters who dream of creating their very own glamping business. Keen to discover more about the holiday industry, Nicki heads to Exmoor National Park where she meets a couple who've transformed a Grade II listed manor house into a luxury bed and breakfast.

videos.title: The Lake District
videos.overview: Today's buyer fell in love with the Lake District as a child and feels that now the time is right to finally make her dream move there. Sonali Shah is on hand with a selection of gorgeous cottages in some of the region's most sought-after villages, including a one-of-a-kind mystery house.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Briony May Williams has her work cut out on as she helps a couple who claim to have viewed over a thousand properties online in their search for their dream home in rural Suffolk. Keeping fit and healthy is a priority, and so is space for all their sports gear.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: Ready to trade town life in the East Midlands for the tranquillity of the North Yorkshire coast, a keen gardener has a £320,000 budget and needs the help of Denise Nurse to move closer to her family and treasured grandson.It's also an important anniversary for some coastal heroes, as the house hunting coincides with the Royal National Lifeboat Institution's 200th anniversary. Denise heads to Whitby to join in with the celebrations.

videos.title: East Sussex
videos.overview: Having met online and fallen in love just over a year ago, today's couple are calling on the help of Nicki Chapman to find them their very first home together in the East Sussex countryside.To better understand what living in this county is like, Nicki meets up with one of its residents, none other than fellow Escape to the Country presenter Alistair Appleton. Alistair welcomes Nicki to his beautiful, off-grid, 200-year-old former coastguard's cottage, which he calls home.

videos.title: Suffolk
videos.overview: Briony May Williams helps a young family who have outgrown their London flat and now need a new home in rural Suffolk, with enough room for two growing children.The exciting property line-up includes a mystery house that has six centuries of stories to tell, some of which are written on its walls!Aside from ancient houses, Briony is excited to meet a fellow baking enthusiast who, after making his own escape to the county a year ago, now sells cakes and runs a supper club from his home.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: Steve Brown is with a buyer who has a £425,000 budget to spend on a new house in her childhood home county of Devon. It's an emotional return to her roots, so with her daughter by her side for support, the trio tour a range of tempting options, including a standout mystery house.On his travels, Steve also visits an organic, family-run orchard, which produces award-winning cider.

videos.title: North Wales
videos.overview: In north Wales, Jules Hudson helps an adventurous buyer turn a favourite holiday destination into his forever home by finding a dog-friendly house with countryside walks on the doorstep.Jules also does his bit for ‘citizen science' when he heads to the coast to learn how the public can safely monitor and protect the region's seal population.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Briony May Williams is property shopping in rural Herefordshire, helping an excited couple who are looking to buy their very first home together where they can finally get their enormous collection of potted plants in the ground. They are delighted by the property options presented to them, and a surprise phone call at the end of the search has everyone holding their breath!Briony also meets another couple who developed a natural-cider business after they made their dream country escape, in search of a more self-sufficient lifestyle.

videos.title: Argyll and Bute
videos.overview: On Argyll and Bute's breathtaking Kintyre peninsula, a couple from suburban Cheshire discover you really can buy a house with a million-dollar view without a million-dollar price tag. With their £250,000 budget and Sonali Shah to guide them, our buyers are looking for a remote Scottish retreat to help spark their creativity.Sonali also meets equine enthusiasts who are living the dream at their 100-acre farm, having turned their passion for horses into a thriving business by giving others the chance to ride through some of the area's most spectacular landscapes.

videos.title: Devon
videos.overview: House-hunting in the gorgeous Devon countryside, Jules Hudson helps two retired drama teachers trade busy Sheffield for some coastal calm. Jules has some splendid properties up his sleeve, including a lovely period cottage boasting a magnificent garden just a stone's throw from the beach.Along the way, he also explores a 550-acre rewilding project brimming with wildflower meadows and teeming with wildlife.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: Kent's charming cottages and picturesque countryside are calling to a mum and son, ready to settle there after years living overseas. With their budget of £350,000, Denise Nurse is on a mission to find them a place to call home, with all the classic Kent character and comfort they've been dreaming of.Whilst in the Garden of England, Denise also discovers a groundbreaking project where bison have been introduced to woodland, helping restore and maintain the landscape naturally.

videos.title: The Midlands
videos.overview: Richie Anderson joins the show's line-up as he helps a couple of born-and-bred Brummies to find the perfect character property on his home turf of the rural Midlands. A turnkey, ready-to-move-into home is high on the priority list for our busy buyers, one of whom is a primary school head teacher. But rebel Richie happily runs the risk of detention when he serves up a mystery house requiring a little extra love and attention.Continuing on his maiden voyage, Richie takes a break from property to skipper a narrowboat as he takes to the water in a bid to learn all about slow tourism.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: North Yorkshire's wide-open spaces are the ideal playground for a couple and their four children from a busy Hampshire town, who can't wait to swap suburbia for a lifelong outdoorsy adventure. Briony May Williams is eager to help them find a family haven with room to roam. Her line-up of potential homes includes a gorgeous 18th-century former mill, complete with a dreamy country kitchen that might just tempt Briony to move in herself!Briony also meets another couple who have found their sweet spot in the county, turning their passion for bees into a buzzing new life.

videos.title: Shropshire
videos.overview: Nicki Chapman helps a couple, and their ginger cat, from the city of Wolverhampton, to search for a new home and lifestyle in Shropshire's beautiful countryside. She showcases a wonderful property selection, including a handsome red brick Victorian farmhouse, a period cottage nestled in a secluded valley and a Mystery House which wouldn't look out of place in the Swiss Alps!Plus, heart rates are elevated as Nicki soars through the skies above Shropshire, taking in a bird's eye view of the spectacular scenery, on one of the longest zipwires in the country.

videos.title: Norfolk and Suffolk Border
videos.overview: Bursting at the seams in their southeast London home, a couple with two girls and a lively puppy head to the Norfolk-Suffolk border in search of space and a new adventure.
