Steve Brown has two charming, listed properties and a striking Mystery House conversion to tempt them.Along the way, he meets another couple who set out to downsize in the area but instead upsized in style, falling head over heels for a 15th-century farmhouse they just couldn't resist.

videos.title: Herefordshire
videos.overview: Sonali Shah helps a couple from Berkshire who are looking for a fresh start in a new home in the Herefordshire countryside, following a life-threatening, life-changing event. With emotions running high during the property tours, Sonali pulls out all the stops to find them not just a new house but a peaceful, rural home where they can truly begin a new chapter.

videos.title: Cumbria
videos.overview: Outdoor adventures are calling in Cumbria, where Jules Hudson helps a couple on the hunt for a rural home with potential for a workshop. After years of success on the Paralympic cycling stage, retirement from sport means time to launch a carpentry business, embrace their shared love of the great outdoors and live life by and in the water. Jules lines up some tempting homes, including a mystery house with plenty of space for both work and play.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Denise Nurse helps a couple from a busy town in Buckinghamshire, who are about to become empty-nesters, find a new home in beautiful Northumberland. However, this move isn't just about them, as grandma is coming too.Denise lines up a string of homes to tempt her buyers with far-reaching views, including a mystery house she hopes will provide the perfect package to suit the whole family.Denise also heads to one of the county's beautiful beaches, where she meets a retired GP whose new passion is creating extraordinary artworks in the sand.

videos.title: North Somerset
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is in glorious North Somerset to help a young couple, about to tie the knot, to find a home in the countryside where they can start a family. From cosy cottages to a showstopping house with incredible views over the Mendip Hills, he's got plenty to tempt them.Alistair also heads to the Somerset Levels to meet a woman who's mastered the art of meditative ‘me time', proving there's more than one way to find inner calm in the countryside.

videos.title: Kent
videos.overview: The Garden of England is calling, as a young couple from Greater London head deeper into the Kent countryside in search of more space and fresh air for them and their two young children. Guiding them every step of the way is Nicki Chapman, who's got some stunning family homes in her line-up, including an epic medieval mystery house packed with wow factor.Nicki's day gets even brighter when she meets a local flower farmer bringing more bursts of colour and beautiful bouquets to the Kent countryside.

videos.title: The Isle of Man
videos.overview: It's a first for Escape to the Country as Jules Hudson heads to the Isle of Man. He's helping a retired nurse from Lincolnshire who has been holidaying on the island for over 70 years. So, the big question is, who is really showing whom around?With a £275,000 budget, they explore charming homes and soak up the highlights, from the harbour town of Peel to the mighty Great Laxey Wheel. There's even a trip on the Snaefell Mountain Railway to enjoy the breathtaking views from the top. Jules also meets an enthusiastic gardener who took the leap and moved to the island from the USA, despite never having heard of it before.

videos.title: North Yorkshire
videos.overview: North Yorkshire is calling, and Briony May Williams is on the case as she helps a London buyer and her beloved dog Buddy swap city bustle for a country cottage. With a £350,000 budget as well as her human best buddy by her side for support, the trio discover charming homes, towns and villages for this rural getaway.Briony also meets a family living on the edge of the amazing moors, where they now roast their own coffee beans for their thriving cafe.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: Sun, sea and seals... it's another glorious escape to the country in Cornwall, where Alistair Appleton is helping a retired couple from the Wirral find their perfect Cornish retreat within walking distance of a pub. After years of happy family holidays there, and now with their son and new grandson living locally, they're ready to make the move and live in Cornwall full-time. With a £400,000 budget and a love of bungalows, Alistair has some tempting options to show them. He also pops by the Cornish Seal Sanctuary to meet some of its permanent and temporary residents.

videos.title: Powys
videos.overview: It's all go in gorgeous Powys as Jules Hudson helps a couple to swap town life in Oxfordshire for his beloved Wales. On the wish list is space for two dogs, three cats and a garage for a motorbike which the brand spanking new mystery eco-house might just deliver.For an inspiring change of pace, Jules visits a brilliant local farming initiative that's helping young people get into agriculture and grow sustainable food for the future.

videos.title: Dorset
videos.overview: With retirement on the horizon and Dorset calling, Ginny Buckley is helping a buyer from London find the right place to start a brand new chapter for her £425,000 budget. Ginny's got plenty to tempt her, from picture-perfect villages to a beautiful mystery house that's so charming, it should come with a bow on top.And for a taste of local success, Ginny meets a family who swapped city life for the coast and now run an upmarket fish-canning business.

videos.title: Gloucestershire and Herefordshire
videos.overview: Alistair Appleton is exploring Herefordshire and Gloucestershire, helping a couple make the move from Germany to the British countryside. Alistair shows them a fantastic mystery house – a smallholding which comes complete with Tom, Barbara, Margo and Jerry, four goats who are already living the good life on the property.Alistair also meets up with a writer who exchanged London life for Herefordshire's green calm and now shares her lovely, inspiring home with a menagerie of animals.

videos.title: Carmarthenshire
videos.overview: Denise Nurse heads to the Garden of Wales, aka Carmarthenshire, to help a pair of retired medical professionals from Jersey find a country retreat for them and their dog. However, it's the amazing mystery house that really gets tails wagging. If you've ever wondered what it's like to have beavers in your backyard, then this one's for you.Along the way, Denise meets a couple who escaped to the county to open a tea shop, proving there's always time for a fresh start and a good brew.

videos.title: Cornwall
videos.overview: It's all action in Cornwall as Jules Hudson teams up with two fitness fanatics from the town of Hertford who are searching for their perfect seaside escape. They're after space for a home pottery studio, with a gym close by, and Jules has lined up some classic Cornish gems to get their hearts racing. The competition heats up even more when they all take to the water at Padstow for a spot of gig boat racing.
